Origin: Sure, sure. Just watch out for lumber jellies, okay? Apparently there are a few still hanging around.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Naturally!
With a bright grin, Kolulu approaches the water and watches as gentle waves wash over her feet.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Oh! Oh golly! The water's so cool and refreshing!

Name: Io
Origin: Haha, why don't you try going for a swim? I promise it'll feel even better then!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Very well. I shall dive right in!

Name: Io
Origin: Wait, what? You can't just—
One taste of the salty water is enough to send Kolulu scrambling back up the beach.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Hack... Cough... Th-that was unexpected.

Name: Io
Origin: I told you seawater's salty, didn't I? Unlike rivers and lakes.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: And creatures actually live in these strange conditions? The sea is truly fascinating!
Kolulu gazes with innocent wonder at the blue expanse before them.
Beside her, another girl stares wide-eyed at the ocean for the first time.

Name: Amira
Origin: The ocean... is so big...

Name: Amira
Origin: Ah... Hey, you. Do you know how to get to Helheim?

Name: Amira
Origin: Oh... Nobody ever knows. Thanks anyway.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Uh, Amira. Did nobody ever tell you not to talk to... er, strangers?

Name: Amira
Origin: No? Everybody's nice. They told me about the good food here. Too bad they don't know about Helheim though.
One day Amira fell out of the clear blue sky and landed on the Grandcypher.
She is looking for her mother, who is waiting in a place called Helheim.
After learning that [Djeeta]'s father might know where Helheim is, she joined the crew on their journey through the sky.

Name: Amira
Origin: Look. There's a crab.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Uh... And?

Name: Amira
Origin: Munch!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa! You're gonna bite down on it just like that?

Name: Amira
Origin: Crunch, chew... It's hard... Tough to eat.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That's 'cause you're supposed to cook it over a fire and shell it first. Sheesh...

Name: Leona
Origin: Ahaha... I'm surprised how relaxed you all are before the big competition.

Name: Leona
Origin: Completely the opposite of me at the moment.
Leona is an adjutant in Idelva's army. Though she never officially married into the family, she is considered by all to be Cain's sister-in-law.
The crew met her through Cain after he helped them in the Nalhegrande Skydom.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What's there to be worried 'bout? It's not like we're seriously going for the win.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We invited you to chow down, you know?

Name: Leona
Origin: I do, but it almost feels rude to take the event lightly after seeing the serious competitors.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Don't worry! Siero said that the most important thing is having a good time!

Name: Lyria
Origin: So don't be so nervous, okay? I'm excited to eat with you, Leona!

Name: Leona
Origin: You're right. I should focus on the fun, shouldn't I? Let's enjoy ourselves, Lyria.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hahaha! Nobody said you can't have fun while going for the win!

Name: Redluck
Origin: And the win is gonna be mine!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Heya, big guy! Guess there's no way you'd be missing out on this, huh?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Do you even need to ask? This competition's got my name written all over it!
Redluck is both a Zeyen monk and a competitive eater chasing after fame.
A monk unlike any other, he travels around winning competitions, prize money, and glory.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Never thought I'd live to see the day they brought it back.

Name: Redluck
Origin: It's like a dream come true, and I don't intend on letting this chance pass me by!

Name: Male Spectator
Origin: Look there! Isn't that Redluck?
Curious passersby overhear the man's exclamation and look in Redluck's direction.

Name: Little Spectator
Origin: It really is! Good luck, Mister Redluck!

Name: Female Spectator
Origin: We'll be rooting for you!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Thank you, thank you! I'll put on a good show!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Everyone sure loves you!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Can't say I'm surprised. The competition enthusiasts must know everything about ya, huh?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hahaha, maybe.

Name: Redluck
Origin: They know me well enough to know I'm gonna win at least! Just you watch!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Hello, everyone! I see you all made it without a problem.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Heya, Siero! Wouldn't miss this for the world!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: I'm sorry I couldn't greet you earlier. I've been so busy with preparations.

Name: Lyria
Origin: That's all right. We're thankful enough for the invitation alone!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Thank you for participating. I'm eager to see how you do.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Speaking of which, it's almost time for the explanation of the rules. You should head over soon!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Gotcha! C'mon, [Djeeta]!
[Djeeta] gathers the crew members and informs them that it's time to go.
Following Sierokarte's directions, the group heads for the competition center.

The competition will be split into three rounds over three days: first is a preliminary round, then an elimination round, and last is the final round. The winner will receive a set of Auguste's finest seafood specialties. Everyone except Redluck expresses excitement at the grand prize, and Vyrn and Lyria hypothesize that it's because Redluck uses the prize money from his competitions to feed starving children. As Redluck grows embarrassed, an unfamiliar voice barges into the conversation.
The crew arrives at the competition stage alongside a mass of other contestants. More and more people enter, and soon the area is filled.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Are all these people here to eat?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Holy moly... There's gotta be at least a thousand people.

Name: Redluck
Origin: The more, the merrier! No fun if it's not a challenge!

Name: Competitor 1
Origin: Yo, look at that guy. He's gotta be Redluck.

Name: Competitor 2
Origin: The rumors were true then. Tch, no point competing now.
Hmph.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Ahem! If I could have your attention please.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Thank you all for attending despite the sweltering weather.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: I hope everyone's as excited as I am for the revival of this legendary event! Can everyone make some noise!
Yeeeeah!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Whoo! All right!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Y-yeah!

Name: Amira
Origin: I'm hungry.

Name: Leona
Origin: Yes!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yaaay!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: With that out of the way, let's go over the rules!
The stadium quiets down, and Sierokarte clears her throat one more time.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: There are three stages to this competition: a preliminary round, an elimination round, and a championship round. The rounds are split over the course of the next three days.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: The preliminary round requires contestants to eat a set minimum in order to advance to the elimination round.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: The elimination round is split into two brackets: one in the morning and one in the afternoon. The winner of each bracket moves on to the final round.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Our champion is then decided by a one-on-one showdown. It's going to be a match for the ages!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Of course, we can't forget the grand prize! Feast your eyes on what we've got prepped!
She lifts the sheet off a nearby pedestal to reveal an enormous platter stacked high with seafood.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: A set of Auguste's finest—rich not only in flavor, but also in price! Only one can take home this rare luxury!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: But which one of you is it going to be? Good luck, everyone!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Wow! So that's the prize Siero mentioned!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Gulp... A bundle of Auguste's ocean delights... It looks so good!

Name: Amira
Origin: If I eat the most, I can eat all that fish!

Name: Leona
Origin: To be able to taste cuisine unknown to Nalhegrande... That sure would be nice.
A competitive spirit grows in the crowd as the prize draws every eye to its glistening edibles.
Only Redluck appears unimpressed. He purses his lips and frowns.

Name: Redluck
Origin: A set prize, huh? I get that it's fancy or whatever, but I sure would've preferred rupies instead.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: It's pretty good advertising though, showcasin' Auguste's specialties. What's wrong with that?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Nothing, it's just... Money's got more uses.
He coughs and glances away. Lyria peers up at him, a look of recognition crossing her face.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hehe! I think I know what you're saying.

Name: Lyria
Origin: If it was money, you could donate it to the orphanage, right?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Oh yeah! You always send your prize money to them, don'tcha?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Shoulda figured, what with that spiel about 'making the world a place where no one ever has to starve' or whatever.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Stop! Stop right there! It's embarrassing when you're shouting it in front of a crowd!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Sheesh, you kids should know better than to mess with your elders...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Haha, couldn't resist! Sorry!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: A world where no one ever has to starve...

Name: Redluck
Origin: What's that? Did you say something, kiddo?

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Oh, no, it's nothing!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Well, I'm not giving up the victory just 'cause there's no money.

Name: Redluck
Origin: And I'm not letting you guys win either, no matter how much you want the food. Sorry, not sorry!

Name: Lyria
Origin: That's okay. I hope you do well, Redluck!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Whoa, whoa, I thought you wanted to win yourself. Why're you cheering me on?

Name: Redluck
Origin: You should be telling me how you're gonna put up a fight and get some blood-pumping tension going.

Name: Redluck
Origin: But I guess that's not your style, eh? Let's do this fair and square, and have a good time!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Of course! We're going to eat as much as we can!
The crew members exchange smiles and laughter as they look forward to the coming days.
But a new face interrupts the merrymaking.
Ya really think you can win with that kinda half-hearted attitude?
His wild voice roars above the din and crashes down like a wave.

The unexpected obtruder reveals himself to be Mash the Smasher, another pro competitive eater. He taunts Redluck, calling his pride as a competitive eater into question, and the two begin to trade harsh barbs. The others can only watch the exchange in uneasy silence.
Suppose a guy like you, who's used to winning, wouldn't bother paying attention to his opponents!
Barging his way into their conversation, a burly man shouts at the crew and glares at Redluck.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who the heck is this guy? He tryna pick a fight?

Name: Redluck
Origin: Tch. Figured you'd show up.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You know him?

Name: Redluck
Origin: I wish I didn't. But yeah.

Name: Redluck
Origin: That's Mash. Another competitive eater with his own following.

Name: Mash
Origin: Mash the Smasher is the name, and don't you forget it!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Uh... huh...

Name: Mash
Origin: You're goin' down this time, Redluck! Mark my words!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hah, that's the hundredth time I've heard that! Surprised you haven't given up yet!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh no... You don't seem to get along very well.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sounds like you've got some history. Is he a rival or something?

Name: Redluck
Origin: You kidding? Guy's a pest I can't shake off, that's all.

Name: Mash
Origin: S'that what you think of me?
Mash marches up to Redluck and leans into his personal space, their faces nearly touching.

Name: Mash
Origin: Big words for a fellow goofing off with a buncha kids. Hah!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Yeah? I don't want to hear that from someone who ain't devoted to the profession.

Name: Mash
Origin: Like you're any better than I am!

Name: Redluck
Origin: You think I'm not giving a hundred and ten percent when I compete? I'm committed to every bite!

Name: Mash
Origin: Oh, look at Mister High-and-Mighty! Just gonna assume I don't throw my soul into every bite too?

Name: Redluck
Origin: What'd you say to me?

Name: Mash
Origin: You heard me! Or are ya deaf?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: O-okay, can we time out for a sec? You're kinda causing a scene...

Name: Redluck
Origin: Sorry... Didn't mean to lose my cool.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Mash, let me just say this.

Name: Redluck
Origin: I may have conquered countless tournaments and contests, but...

Name: Redluck
Origin: I can't call myself a pro if I don't win this title! Victory here is everything to me!

Name: Mash
Origin: The same goes for me! There are people I've gotta make proud, and I ain't resting until I do!

Name: Redluck
Origin: You, actually caring about others' opinions? Color me surprised.

Name: Redluck
Origin: We've both got our own reasons to win then.

Name: Redluck
Origin: So enough speaking with our mouths. Let's do what we do best... and see who can stomach more on the main stage!

Name: Mash
Origin: Now you're speaking my language! Hope you're ready to lose!
As fast as he had arrived, Mash turns away and disappears into the crowd.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Psh. Bring it on.

Name: Redluck
Origin: [Djeeta], I'm gonna go clear my head. Catch you later.
Redluck leaves in the opposite direction, his face deadly serious.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What... just happened?
Vyrn's question meets silence as the others try to process what they just witnessed.

[Djeeta] and Vyrn decide to withdraw from the competition to help Sierokarte. As they walk around, they run into Charlotta. She informs the two that she has entered the competition as Sevastien is one of the chefs preparing food for each round. Sevastien himself appears in Lucio-inspired attire alongside Lucio, and the group enjoys friendly conversation before it is time for the preliminary round to start.
Following Redluck and Mash's confrontation, [Djeeta] and Vyrn part with Lyria and the others to head to the beach.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That sure threw me for a loop. Never seen the big guy so serious before.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Siero wasn't kidding when she mentioned how much people cared about this event, huh?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Almost makes me feel relieved to be stuck with this job instead.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: Why, if it isn't [Djeeta] and Vyrn!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: You appear to be discussing a weighty subject. Is something the matter?
Charlotta serves as captain of the Lumiel Order of Holy Knights.
She is searching for a way to rectify her short height, and met the crew during her travels.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Kinda, sorta. What about you? You look a bit antsy.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: Just moments ago, I entered myself into the eating competition!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: I shall approach this duel of sustenance without hesitation, even if you are my opponent, [Djeeta]!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Er... Sorry to burst your bubble, but me and [Djeeta] had to drop out.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: What? But why?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: The Knickknack Shack needs us on deck for the next few days, y'see.
After the altercation between Redluck and Mash, Sierokarte approached the crew.
She explained that the competition attracted far more people than expected, which left the staff shorthanded.
Vyrn and [Djeeta] decided to step down from the contest and offer their assistance, so that Lyria and the others could focus on their food.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Siero really needed the help, and we don't mind cheering from the sidelines, so we figured we could let the others have their fun.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: I see. A most noble sacrifice.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I gotta say, I didn't think you'd be interested in joining the fun too. Since when did you care about serious eating?

Name: Charlotta
Origin: In all honesty, I didn't originally intend to compete.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: However, I could not resist once I discovered that Sevastien was selected to prepare the food!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: He's one of the chefs? Wow, everyone's gonna be in for a treat!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: To be recognized as one of the few who can utilize lumber jelly to its fullest potential...

Name: Charlotta
Origin: Sevastien is truly skilled! I could not be prouder of his feats!

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Hohoho! I am flattered to hear such praise from you.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Heya, Sevastien! Grats on bein' hired to cook—

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wait, what the heck!

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Is something the matter? You appear simply gobsmacked.
Sevastien is an elderly gentleman who serves Charlotta and upholds the same principles of justice.
Though he appears to be simply her butler, in truth he serves as the archpraetor of the Lumiel Order of Holy Knights.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That's because I am! What's with that getup?

Name: Sevastien
Origin: I, too, long for relaxation and wish to join the revelry.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: It's quite suitable for the occasion, isn't it?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: There's a difference between taking a load off and completely changin' character!

Name: Sevastien
Origin: So you say, but this is my true form. I apologize for keeping it hidden until now.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: The devoted servant you've always known is but a mask.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: I was an avid partygoer and troublemaker once upon a time.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: The beaches were my playgrounds, and I roamed without restraint.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: This sounds like one tall tale, but I can't tell if you're kidding or not...

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Hoho! Joking aside...

Name: Sevastien
Origin: I am quite fond of these sunglasses, though I never would have picked them out myself.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So then who did?

Name: Lucio
Origin: That would be me.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Seriously?

Name: Lucio
Origin: It's to commemorate our blossoming friendship. What could be more heartfelt than a matching accessory, after all?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Seems to me like you're doing your own thing like always.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wait, did you say friendship? You guys are friends? Since when?

Name: Lucio
Origin: I heard that a single taste of the Lumiel Gourmand's food was enough to prolong one's life.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I wished to know the secret behind such masterful work, and so I approached Sevastien.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That's one way to start a conversation, I guess... Did you learn anything in the end?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Unfortunately not.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: It is not a secret that can be simply learned from another.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Rather, it is the natural result of experience and accumulating knowledge... The Lumiel Gourmand is nothing more, nothing less.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Fascinating. Perhaps I will attempt a hundred years of study and see where the experience takes me.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Now that is an intriguing idea.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hehe.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Oh dear, I'm afraid we'll have to continue this another time. I must get to cooking.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Though I won't be directing the kitchen for the preliminaries, I still have a role to fulfill.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who's in charge if you're not then?

Name: Sevastien
Origin: You are acquainted with them. But I shall leave the answer to your imagination until the main event.

Name: Sevastien
Origin: Which should be starting soon, if I recall correctly.

Name: Charlotta
Origin: Oh, that's right! I should hurry over!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We've got some time before we gotta meet up with Siero, right? Let's go take a look, [Djeeta]!
Charlotta, Vyrn, and [Djeeta] part with Sevastien and Lucio.
Charlotta heads for the participants' area while Vyrn and [Djeeta] claim seats in the stands.
バックステージにて、アオイドスは無数の観客の歓声を聞いていた。アオイドスにとって、それはずっと求めていた景色だった。ビィ・ラカム・バアルとともに念願のアウギュステフェス出場の喜びに打ち震えるアオイドスだが、どこか不安げな様子。しかし、決意とともにステージへと踏み出した。最高の、そして最後のGIGのために──
Korean: 백스테이지에서, 아오이도스는 무수히 많은 관객의 환호성을 듣고 있었다. 아오이도스에게 있어서, 그것은 계속해서 원해왔던 풍경이었다. 비이, 라캄, 바알과 염원하던 아우규스테 페스 출장의 기쁨에 전율하고있던 아오이도스지만, 어딘가 불안한 모습. 하지만, 결의와 함께 스테이지에 나섰다. 최고의, 그리고 최후의 GIG을 위해서──

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
俺はずっと待っていた。
バンドメンバー達と共に見る
この景色を。
Korean: 지금까지 계속 기다리고 있었다. 밴드 멤버들과 함께 이 경치를 보는 순간을.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
空域中のモンスター達が集まる
アウギュステフェス──
ついにそのステージに立ったんだ。
Korean: 공역 안의 몬스터들이 몰려드는 아우규스테 페스... 드디어 그 스테이지에 올라왔어.

Name: ラカム
Origin:
……ったく、とんでもねえ所に
来ちまったもんだぜ。
Korean: ...하아. 정말 말도 안 되는 곳까지 와 버렸군.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
この男はアカイドス。
俺の隣でベースを弾く傍ら、
騎空艇の操舵をこなす。
Korean: 이 남자는 아카이도스. 내 곁에서 베이스를 치는 한편 기공정의 조타를 맡고 있다.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
へへっ、まったくだな！
何人いんだよ、観客。
Korean: 헤헤, 그러게 말야! 관객이 얼마나 많은 거야?

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
キイロイドス。見ての通り人ではない。
ゆえに人間には不可能といわれる曲すら
叩いてみせる、まさに化け物ドラマー
Korean: 키이로이도스. 보이는 것처럼 인간이 아니다. 그렇기에 인간에게는 불가능하다고 일컬어지는 곡마저 훌륭하게 소화해낸다. 말 그대로 괴물 드러머...

Name: バアル
Origin:
フ……
これだけの観客を前にして
かえって尻込みしないとはな。
Korean: 후... 이 정도로 많은 관객들이 몰려왔는데 겁먹지도 않는 모양이군.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
クロイドス。
俺のギターを分厚くサポートする
最高のサイドギター
Korean: 쿠로이도스. 내 기타를 탄탄하게 서포트해 주는 최고의 사이드 기타.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
当然だ。ステージの上に俺がいれば
自然と皆が俺を見てしまう。
緊張する理由はないさ。
Korean: 당연하지. 스테이지 위에 내가 있으면 자연히 모두들 나를 보게 되니까. 긴장할 이유가 없잖아.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
そしてアオイドス。生まれ持った才能と
美しい容姿から神の嫉妬を買い、
幾多の試練を与えられた男。
Korean: 그리고 아오이도스. 태어날 때부터 가진 재능과 아름다운 외모로 신의 질투를 사 수많은 시련을 부여받고 만 남자.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
この俺であり、俺が率いるバンド
「DOSS」のリーダーにして
ギター＆ヴォーカルだ。
Korean:
그리고
"DOSS"의 리더로서 기타 겸 보컬을 맡고 있는 사람이 바로 나다.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
……お前、大丈夫なのかよ？
色々あったけど……
Korean: ...너 괜찮겠어? 이런저런 일이 많았잖아...

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
質問は選べ、キイロイドス。
俺が最高のGIGにする……
いや、なってしまうのは明白だ。
Korean: 어리석은 질문이군, 키이로이도스. 내가 최고의 GIG를 만들 거라는 건... 아니, 그렇게 되어버릴 거라는 것은 명백해.

Name: アオイドス
Origin: ……そのあとは、なるようになれ、だ。
Korean: 그 이후에는... 될 대로 되라지.

Name: ラカム
Origin:
無茶するなよ？
また倒れられたら困るからな……
Korean: 너무 무리하지 마라. 또 쓰러지면 큰일이니까.

Name: アオイドス
Origin: ……ああ。
Korean: ……그래.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
緊張を覚えるのは珍しかった。
準備不足や体調、
不安要素があまりに多い。
Korean: 이런 긴장감이 든 것은 흔치 않은 일이었다. 준비 부족, 컨디션 난조 등 불안요소가 지나치게 많았다.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
だが、確信めいたものはあった。
夢見ていたアウギュステフェスに
DOSSは名を残すと。
Korean: 하지만 확신 비슷한 감각이 들었다. DOSS는 항상 꿈꿔오던 아우규스테 페스에 그 이름을 남길 것이다.

Name: フェス運営者
Origin:
DOSSの皆さん、
ステージへお願いします！
Korean: DOSS 여러분, 스테이지 준비됐습니다!

Name: アオイドス
Origin: いくぞ。
Korean: 가자.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
けれど、歓声が全てをかき消した。
一点の曇りもない胸の中を映すように
青空は眩しく──
Korean: 환성이 그 모든 것을 지워버렸다. 푸른 하늘은 한 점의 구름도 없는 나의 가슴 속을 나타내듯 눈부셨다.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
最高の天気だ。
俺に嫉妬ばかりしていた神も、
今日ばかりは祝福せざるをえないか。
Korean: 최고의 날씨로군. 항상 날 질투하기만 하던 신도 오늘만은 축복하지 않을 수 없었던 모양이야.

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
……恐らくこれが
DOSS最後のGIGになる。
Korean:
...아마도 이게 DOSS로서의 마지막 GIG*이 될 거다.

*GIG, 긱. 라이브하우스 등에서 벌이는 연주

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
このアウギュステフェスに、
伝説を……
いや、神話を残そうじゃないか。
Korean: 이 아우규스테 페스에 전설을... 아니 신화를 남기는 거다.

Name: アオイドス
Origin: Ａｈｈｈｈｈｈ────……！！
Korean: Ａｈｈｈｈｈｈ────……！！

Name: アオイドス
Origin:
そして全てを理解した。
度が過ぎた神の嫉妬は
この瞬間のためにあったのだと──
Korean: 그리고 모든 것을 이해할 수 있었다. 지금까지 신의 지나친 질투는 바로 이 순간을 위해 존재했던 거라고 말이다.

Origin: The cheers of the crowd reach Aoidos backstage. Performing here at Auguste Festival with his fellow bandmates—Vyrn, Rackam, and Baal—is a dream come true, but he can't shake a feeling of dread. Even so, he takes the stage for the greatest—and final—show of the Doss.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: So here we are, gazing out on a sea of revelers. It's everything I've been waiting for.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Auguste Festival is home to the skydom's musical monsters, and now it's our time to take the stage.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Phew, this ain't like playin' in a smoky dive, I'll give ya that.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: The guy next to me is Vermillios. His capable helmsman hands translate surprisingly well to the strings of a bass guitar.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Holy smokes! How many people do you think are out there?

Name: Aoidos
Origin: That's Dandelios. He's a beast of a drummer talent-wise, and he naturally looks the part; no costume needed.

Name: Baal
Origin: Hm. All the more reason we mustn't falter in front of this crowd.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Shados. One of the best rhythm guitarists I've been lucky enough to have backing me up.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Fear not, my fine fellows. All eyes will be trained on me anyway, so there's no reason for any of you to be nervous.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Last but not least is me, Aoidos—a man born with talent and looks that make the gods green with envy. They can't help but screw with me.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: So as the lead guitarist and vocalist, why shouldn't I be the de facto leader of the Doss?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Uh, you sure you're up for this? I mean, you've been through a lot lately...

Name: Aoidos
Origin: A silly question, Dandelios. I've got a historic performance to put on, though it's more or less a done deal.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: And then after all is sung and done, what'll be will be.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Fine, but don't push it, all right? Can't have you faintin' on us again.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: I got it.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Can't remember the last time I was nervous. The lack of practice and stress are taking their toll.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: But I've still got confidence aplenty. My dream of playing at Auguste Festival comes true today; the Doss is going to go down in history.

Name: Festival Rep.
Origin: Okay, guys! The stage is yours!

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Let's rock 'n' roll.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: The screams of the fans fade in an instant. A dazzling clear blue sky hangs above me, reflecting how I feel inside.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Such perfect weather. Perhaps the gods that curse me with their incessant jealously have no choice but to begrudgingly grant me their blessings.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: This may very well be the last gig the Doss ever plays.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Everyone present is a witness to history—to the birth of a legend.

Name: Aoidos
Origin: Aaaaah!

Name: Aoidos
Origin: It all makes sense to me now. Those jealous gods? Their pettiness was meant to prep me for this one shining moment.
ついに街の目前まで迫る[ジータ]一行。その頃、エルステ帝国の戦艦では、将軍フュリアスがドランクとスツルムに苛立ちを見せながらも、順調な計画に邪悪な笑みを浮かべていた。

エルステ帝国が誇る戦艦の一室。
そこではひとりの将軍が、
批難の声を上げていた。

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
なんで！？
ねぇねぇねぇ、なんでなの！？

Name: スツルム
Origin: 将軍閣下……申し訳ありません。

Name: ドランク
Origin:
ごめんねぇ～
あいつら、意外と強くってさぁ～

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
誰か！
こいつらの首、
すぐにはねちゃってくんない！？

Name: 帝国兵
Origin:
将軍閣下……
彼らは黒騎士様の勅令で
動いておりますゆえ……

Name: 帝国兵
Origin:
我々の手では、
閣下のご命令と言えど、
どうにも罰することは……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
じゃあ、お前でいいや。
あとでスッパリやられといてね。

Name: 帝国兵
Origin: そんな……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
まぁ、時間を稼いでくれたおかげで、
計画は順調だからね……
ご覧よ、ふたりとも……この暴風を。

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
この島……いや、この群島すべては、
じきに嵐の中に沈み、落ちていくんだ。
……暗い暗い空の底へとね。
[ジータ]一行は街に帰り着くが、この嵐では帝国を迎え撃つより先に近くの島へ避難すべきだと判断する。脱出艇の操縦には相当の腕前が必要とされる中、凄腕の操舵士と謳われたラカムへと期待が集まる。

[ジータ]達が、
ようやく戻った街は、
かつてない風雨に襲われていた。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
なんなんだよこの雨……
いままでこんな嵐、
一度だってなかったぜ？

Name: シェロカルテ
Origin:
変ですよね～
さっきまでは晴れてたんですけどね～

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
この天候では、
帝国を迎え撃つなどという話を
している場合ではないな……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
こんだけ酷い嵐なら、
帝国も動けねーだろ！
まずは避難することを考えねーと！

Name: シェロカルテ
Origin:
そうですね～
避難用の騎空艇はありますから、
それに乗って近くの島へ……

Name: 町人１
Origin:
……おい、それ、
誰が操縦するんだ？

Name: 町人２
Origin:
え？ だ、誰か……
あたしは無理よ？
こんな嵐の中じゃ……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
そういえば……
操舵士はみんな出払ってるって……

Name: シェロカルテ
Origin:
そうですね～
特にもう、ここまで風が強いと、
並の操舵士じゃ、危ないです～

Name: シェロカルテ
Origin:
それこそ、
トップクラスの……
凄腕の操舵士じゃないと～

Name: ラカム
Origin: な、なんだよ……？

Name: 町人３
Origin:
おい！ 大変だ！
嵐に紛れて
魔物が街のすぐ近くまで来てるぞ！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
言いたいことがあるのはわかるが……
まずはこっちが先だ！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
[ジータ]！
ちゃっちゃと片付けるぞ！
ラカムは過去の墜落を街の皆に語り、脱出艇の舵を握ることを拒む。しかし、街の住人達はそれでもラカムの腕を信じ、その思いに応えるべくラカムは覚悟を決める。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
――いいか？
確かに俺は[ジータ]と一緒に、
帝国と戦うとは言ったぜ？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
でもな、騎空艇を操縦するかどうかは、
それとはまた別の問題で……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
しかし、この状況ではもう、
私達も街の人も、
頼れるのは君だけなんだ……

Name: シェロカルテ
Origin:
そうですよ～
汚名返上のチャンスですよ～？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
あのなぁ……
俺は……俺はもう、
空に捨てられてんだぞ？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
だから、
グランサイファーだって墜落した……
お前らは……怖くねぇのかよ？

Name: ルリア
Origin: 怖い……？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
俺が操縦したら、
また艇が落ちるかもしれねぇ……
そうは考えねぇのか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
グランサイファーに乗ってたとき、
俺は奇跡的に助かった。
……大怪我はしたけどな。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
けど今度は、
助からねぇかもしれねぇ……
それも、お前らを道連れにして……な。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
それでもお前らは、
俺が操縦する艇に乗るのが
怖くないって……

Name: ラカム
Origin: 痛ってぇ！？

Name: 町人
Origin:
馬鹿かお前は！
まだそんなこと言うなら、
もう一発殴ってやろうか！？

Name: ルリア
Origin:
ラカムさん……よく見てください。
私達の、街の人の顔を……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
誰も不安そうな顔なんて
してないじゃないですか。

Name: ラカム
Origin: お前ら……
脱出艇へ行こう
まだ不安？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
そうだな……
みんなが腹くくってんだ……
俺が女々しくっちゃ話にならねぇよな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
いや……
ありがとよ、[ジータ]……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
俺だってなぁ……
てめぇらの期待に応えるくらいの
甲斐性はあらぁ！！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
よっしゃ！
そんならすぐにみんなを連れて
脱出艇に向かおうぜ！
ラカムを加えた[ジータ]一行は、街の住人を連れて脱出艇へと向かう。その道中、ラカムはこの突然の嵐に疑問を持つ。

Name: ラカム
Origin: それにしても、変な嵐だな……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
変とは……？
ラカム、この嵐に何か
思うところがあるのか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
思うところも何も、
そもそもこのポート・ブリーズで
嵐になること自体、珍しいんだよ。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
そういや、なんか言ってたよな！
この島には、
風の守り神がいるんだっけか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ああ、そうさ……
この島に吹く風は全て、
ティアマトっつー守り神様の息吹なんだ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
守り神……おそらくは星晶獣か。
そのティアマトとやらに、
何かあったのかもしれないな。

Name: ラカム
Origin:
何百年も前からの言い伝えだぜ？
ティアマトなんて
本当にいるかどうか……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
います……いますよ、絶対に。
ティアマトは、この島に……
[ジータ]にも……わかりますか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
お、おい、嬢ちゃん？
どうしたんだよ、急に。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
聞こえるんです……
それに感じる……
吹き荒ぶ風の、強大な星の力を……
街の住人を連れ、[ジータ]一行は嵐から逃れるための脱出艇がある洞窟へと急ぐ。しかし、洞窟には、まるでこの状況を先読みしていたかのように、フュリアス率いる帝国軍が待ち構えていた。

徐々に強くなる嵐の中、
街の住人を連れた一同は、
脱出艇のある渓谷へと辿り着いた。

Name: ビィ
Origin: こいつが脱出艇だな！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
これなら、
街の人もみんな乗れそうですね！

Name: カタリナ
Origin: さぁ、ラカム、操舵室へ……

Name: ラカム
Origin: あ、ああ……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ん？ どうしたんだよ？
なんで乗らねーんだ？
ラカムが乗らないと始まらねーぜ？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
い、いや……
それは、わかってんだけどよ……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
その……
や、やっぱり俺……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
――ったくさぁ！
乗るなら乗るで、
ちゃっちゃとやれよな！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
お前……確かに俺が撃ったはずだぜ？
なんでそんなにピンピンしてんだよ！？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
当たり前だろ？
高貴なボクが下賤なお前らの弾丸で
傷一つでも負うと思ってんの？

Name: ルリア
Origin:
カタリナ……
あの人……なんだか変な感じがする。
怖いよ……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
大丈夫だ、ルリア。
何も心配することはない……

Name: 町人
Origin:
ひぃっ！？
へ、兵隊が……！！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
とにかく街の人を守らねぇと！
[ジータ]！
帝国の連中を追っ払うぞ！
街人を帝国兵から守る[ジータ]一行だが、徐々にその数の差に圧倒され始める。そんな中、住人達の頼みであった脱出艇が突如爆発する。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ある程度は退かせたが、
これではキリがないな……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
いいねぇ……
ねぇねぇねぇ、疲れた？ 限界？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
でもね……
メインディッシュは、
まだこれからなんだ。

Name: 町人
Origin:
こ、こんな奴ら付き合いきれねぇ！
脱出艇に乗って逃げようぜ！

Name: ルリア
Origin: ……！？ 危ないっ！！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
な、なんだ！？
脱出艇が爆発したのか！？

Name: ルリア
Origin: だ、大丈夫ですか！？

Name: 町人
Origin: う、うう……いったい何が……？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
ぎゃはははははは！！
いいねぇ！ その顔、サイッコー！！
その信じらんないって顔！ くくく……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
そうだよ、爆破したんだよ！
てめぇらが頼みにしていた脱出艇をな！
木端微塵だ！ ぎゃははははは！！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
てめぇ……！！
なんでこんなことを！？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
知りたい？ 知りたいよね？
そうだなぁ……
生き残ってたら教えてあげるよ。

Name: フュリアス
Origin: だから、まぁ、せいぜい頑張れば？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
外道が……！！
[ジータ]！ 止めてくれるなよ……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
奴の手の者など……
この私が叩き切ってくれる！！
フュリアスの手によって脱出艇が破壊され、街の住人と共に絶体絶命の状況へと追い込まれる[ジータ]一行。そんな中、嵐の原因は星晶獣ティアマトであることを知る。

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
――やるねぇ！
うんうん、やっぱり君達って、
見所があるなぁ。

Name: ラカム
Origin: 黙れ！ 今度はてめぇの番だぞ！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
嵐がこれ以上強くなる前に、
街のみんなをどこかに、
避難させねぇと……

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
ぎゃはははは！！
まぁだそんなこと言ってんのかよ！？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
どこへ逃げようったって同じなんだよ！
どうせこの群島は、
全部丸ごと沈んじまうんだからなぁ！！

Name: カタリナ
Origin: 貴様……どういうことだ！？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
わかってんだろ？ 薄々さぁ！
ティアマトだよ、ティアマト！！
この島の守り神サマさ！

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
そいつにね……
ちょっと細工させてもらったんだ。
……大暴走を始めるようにさぁ！！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ティアマトを暴走させただと！？
この野郎、なんてことを……！

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
この嵐が何よりの証拠だ！
嵐は際限なく強くなるよ……
この群島を吹き飛ばすほどにな！！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
てめぇ……
街どころか、この群島そのものを
滅ぼそうってのか！？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
いったいどれだけの人が
犠牲になると思ってんだ！！

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
さぁ？ 知らないよ、そんなの。
ボクら帝国に支配されたくないほど、
アンタ達はこの群島が好きなんだろ？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
だったら、
せいぜい心中でもしてろよ！！
空の底に落ちるこの群島とさぁ！！

Name: 町人１
Origin: なんてことだ……

Name: 町人２
Origin: そんな……私達もう助からないの？

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
そうそう……それとね？
この群島から逃げようとする騎空艇は、
みんなまとめて撃ち落とすから。

Name: フュリアス
Origin:
わかるよね？ ね？
つまり、お前らにはもう、
逃げ場なんてどこにもねぇんだよ！！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ふざけんなよ！！
てめぇら、この街の住人を
何だと思ってやがる！？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
[ジータ]！
とりあえず、屋外のここは危険だ！
住人達を、一度街に戻そう！

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
その間、魔物や帝国の兵士は、
こちらで相手をせねばな……いくぞ！
帝国兵をなんとか撒くが、[ジータ]一行には暗い雰囲気が漂い始める。しかし、ルリアは決して希望を捨てはしなかった。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
もう帝国の人達は、
追ってきていないみたいです……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
そりゃそうだろうぜ……
あとは放っておいても、
この島に居る奴はみんな……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ビィくん、それ以上は言うな。
まだ私達は、
諦めるわけにはいかないのだからな……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
必ず何か、手はあるはずだ……
何か、必ず……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
ティアマト……
ポート・ブリーズの守り神であり、
風の……大星晶獣。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
いまは悩んでる場合じゃねぇ……か。
早く先に進まねーとな！
嵐の原因が星晶獣であるからこそ、なんとかできるかもしれない、と告げるルリア。ルリアの決意に一筋の希望の光が差し込む。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ふぅ……
これで住人は皆、街に戻れたようだ。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
しかし、
困った状況になったな……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
俺のせいだ……
俺があのとき……
脱出艇に乗るのを、躊躇わなければ……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
そうすりゃいまごろ、
みんなは、
隣の群島にでも避難できてたはずだ……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
やめろラカム！
んなこと言ったって、しょうがねぇぜ！

Name: ラカム
Origin:
みんな、俺に命を預ける覚悟を
してくれたってのに……
俺があいつらの想いを台無しに……

Name: ラカム
Origin:
くそっ！
これで本当にお終いだってのか！？
何か方法はねぇのか！？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
守り神とまで称される星晶獣相手では、
私達にいったい、何ができるか……

Name: ルリア
Origin: できます……まだ希望はあります。

Name: カタリナ
Origin: ルリア……？

Name: ルリア
Origin:
まだ私がいます……
ねぇ、カタリナ？ そうだよね？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
そうか……！
……い、いや、しかし、
その力にはどんな影響があるか……

Name: ラカム
Origin: おい、どういうことだ……？

Name: ルリア
Origin:
私が……
ずっと帝国に囚われていた理由です。

Name: ルリア
Origin: 私には……星晶獣を従える力がある。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ちょ、ちょっと待てよ！
星晶獣は自分達の作り手である
星の民にしか従わねぇんじゃねーのか？

Name: ラカム
Origin:
ああ……それに、星の民はもう、
何百年も前の覇空戦争で姿を消して
子孫はいないって聞いてるぜ？

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
ルリアは、星の民の子孫ではないよ。
……おそらくな。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
理由も原理もわからない……
しかし、ルリアには確かに、
そういう力がある。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あ！ なぁ、[ジータ]！
ザンクティンゼルで現れた星晶獣も、
もしかして……

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
その可能性はある……
しかし、これは謎の多い力なんだ。
結局、帝国も何も解明できなかった。

Name: カタリナ
Origin:
そんな力を多用すれば、
ルリアにどんな影響があるか……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
私は大丈夫。
だって、みんなが……
[ジータ]が居てくれるから……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
行きましょう、ラカムさん。
風の大星晶獣……
ティアマトを止めるために……！！

ルリアの決意に、
一筋の希望の光が差し込む。

その輝きを頼りに、
[ジータ]達は、
ティアマトの元へと向かう。
Major General Furias is angry that Sturm and Drang failed to stop [Djeeta] and the others, but his plan is still unfolding.
On an Erste Empire warship, a major general barks at two lackeys who've just returned.

Name: Furias
Origin: How'd this happen? Why and how and why!

Name: Sturm
Origin: My apologies, sir. We have no excuse.

Name: Drang
Origin: Sorry! They were way stronger than we thought they'd be!

Name: Furias
Origin: Someone execute these fools! Immediately!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Sir, these two are under the command of the Black Knight...

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: We can't punish them even if you order us.

Name: Furias
Origin: Then I'll punish you instead. One clean cut should do the trick!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: But, sir...

Name: Furias
Origin: Regardless, you two still managed to buy me some time, and my plan's moving right along. Just look at this storm!

Name: Furias
Origin: Soon this island—No! The entire archipelago will be plunged into the darkest depths of the sky...
Due to a heavy storm, [Djeeta] and the others must use an escape airship to evacuate the townspeople. But Rackam is the only helmsman around.
[Djeeta] and the others finally reach the town, which is weathering strong winds and rain.

Name: Rackam
Origin: What's going on with this rain? I've never seen a storm like this before!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: How strange... It was clear just a moment ago.

Name: Katalina
Origin: We can't fight back the empire in this kind of weather.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Even they must be helpless in a storm like this! We've gotta get away from here!

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: You're right! And we have an escape airship, so let's head to a nearby island.

Name: Townsperson 1
Origin: Who's gonna pilot that thing?

Name: Townsperson 2
Origin: Who? Well, don't look at me! Not in a storm like this anyway...

Name: Lyria
Origin: I almost forgot... All the helmsmen are out on business.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Indeed, indeed... And we wouldn't want any average helmsman for a storm this intense.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: Only the best of the best would have a chance...

Name: Rackam
Origin: Why are you all looking at me?

Name: Townsperson 3
Origin: We're in trouble! Monsters confused by the storm are nearing the town!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Let's handle this first. You can lecture me about piloting later!

Name: Rackam
Origin: [Djeeta], let's take out these monsters!
Rackam refuses to pilot the escape airship. But when the townsfolk show their faith in him, he decides to take the helm once again.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Look, I know I agreed to fight the empire with you guys...

Name: Rackam
Origin: But piloting airships is a whole other matter!

Name: Katalina
Origin: There's no one else we can count on though.

Name: Sierokarte
Origin: She's right! And this could be your shot at redemption!

Name: Rackam
Origin: I'm telling you... The skies don't have a use for me anymore.

Name: Rackam
Origin: That's why I crashed the Grandcypher. Aren't you scared at all?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Scared?

Name: Rackam
Origin: I might crash again. Hasn't that crossed your minds?

Name: Rackam
Origin: It was a miracle that I survived after crashing the Grandcypher. Got beat up pretty badly...

Name: Rackam
Origin: But I might not be so lucky this time, and you'll all be on board with me.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Are you still going to tell me you're not scared?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Ouch!

Name: Townsperson
Origin: How stupid can you be! Keep whining and I'll hit you again!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Take a good look at the faces all around you, Rackam.

Name: Lyria
Origin: No one looks worried, do they?

Name: Rackam
Origin: You guys...
Let's get to that airship!
Are you still worried?

Name: Rackam
Origin: You're right. Everyone's already prepared for the worst. I can't chicken out here!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Not anymore. Thanks, [Djeeta].

Name: Rackam
Origin: Besides, I've gotta live up to your expectations! The best of the best!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: All right! If that's settled, then let's make our escape!
Rackam leads everyone to the escape airship while growing wary of the sudden storm.

Name: Rackam
Origin: This is one weird storm...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Something about the storm strikes you as strange, Rackam?

Name: Rackam
Origin: For Port Breeze to have a storm is rare in and of itself.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: That reminds me! Is there a guardian or something on this island?

Name: Rackam
Origin: There is, indeed. All winds that blow on this island are the breath of Tiamat, a guardian deity of sorts.

Name: Katalina
Origin: It sounds like a primal beast. Maybe Tiamat has something to do with the storm.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Tiamat's legend has been around for centuries. Tough to say if there's any truth to it though.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Tiamat's here on the island. I'm sure of it. You can sense it too, right, [Djeeta]?

Name: Rackam
Origin: What's gotten into you all of a sudden, little miss?

Name: Lyria
Origin: I can hear it... I can feel it. The power of the stars courses through the wind...
Everyone reaches the escape airship only to find imperial soldiers waiting for them.
The storm grows in strength, but everyone finally reaches the valley where the escape airship is located.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Looks like we found it!

Name: Lyria
Origin: And it's big enough for all of us to board!

Name: Katalina
Origin: All right, Rackam. To the helm!

Name: Rackam
Origin: R-right...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? Why aren't you getting on board? We can't do anything without you, Rackam!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Sure, I get that. But...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I knew it. I can't—

Name: Furias
Origin: Just hurry up and board already! I don't have all day, you know!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Didn't I shoot you earlier? How are you back on your feet?

Name: Furias
Origin: Isn't it obvious? Pathetic scum like you could never hurt a noble soul like me.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I'm sensing something weird about him, Katalina. He's scaring me...

Name: Katalina
Origin: It's fine, Lyria. You needn't worry.

Name: Townsperson
Origin: Eep! Soldiers!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We have to protect the townsfolk! Let's chase these imperial creeps outta here, [Djeeta]!
[Djeeta] and the others protect the townsfolk, but General Furias blows up the escape airship before anyone can board it.

Name: Katalina
Origin: We've been able to keep them at bay, but they just keep coming...

Name: Furias
Origin: How wonderful! Exhausted yet? Finally had enough?

Name: Furias
Origin: Here's the thing... We haven't even gotten to the main course yet!

Name: Townsperson
Origin: There's no time for this! Hurry to the airship!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Watch out!

Name: Katalina
Origin: I can't believe it! The airship just exploded!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Are you all right?

Name: Townsperson
Origin: Nghh... What in the skies...

Name: Furias
Origin: Ha-ha-ha! Wonderful! I just love the expressions of utter disbelief on your faces!

Name: Furias
Origin: That's right! I blew it up! That precious airship of yours is nothing but flotsam now! Ha-ha-ha!

Name: Rackam
Origin: You brat! Why'd you do that?

Name: Furias
Origin: You want to know? Burning with curiosity, are you? Then I'll tell you... if you survive!

Name: Furias
Origin: So go ahead. Give it your best shot!

Name: Katalina
Origin:
You fiend!
Listen, [Djeeta], don't try and stop me!

Name: Katalina
Origin: I'll defeat his flunkies myself!
Major General Furias admits to sending Tiamat into a rampage that is brewing a storm to sink the islands. Katalina decides to get everyone back to town.

Name: Furias
Origin: Not bad! Hm... I guess you idiots might have some redeeming qualities after all!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Shut it! You're next, pal!

Name: Rackam
Origin: With you out of the way, we'll get the townsfolk to safety before this storm gets worse!

Name: Furias
Origin: Ha-ha-ha! You haven't given up on that yet?

Name: Furias
Origin: It doesn't matter where you run! This entire archipelago is about to sink into oblivion!

Name: Katalina
Origin: What are you talking about?

Name: Furias
Origin: Don't you get it? You must have an inkling... I'm talking about Tiamat! The guardian of this island!

Name: Furias
Origin: Let's just say... our handiwork has sent her into a massive rampage!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You did what? Are you for real?

Name: Furias
Origin: Look for yourselves at this incredible storm! It'll only get stronger... until it blows the whole archipelago away!

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's not just the town... You're trying to destroy the islands themselves?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Do you have any idea how many innocent lives will be lost?

Name: Furias
Origin: Who knows? But if you idiots love these islands enough to resist the empire...

Name: Furias
Origin: Then I imagine you'll be happy plunging to the bottom of the skies with it!

Name: Townsperson 1
Origin: How can this be?

Name: Townsperson 2
Origin: I can't believe it! Are we doomed?

Name: Furias
Origin: Indeed, you are! I've already given orders to shoot down any airships attempting to flee!

Name: Furias
Origin: You finally get it now, right? Right? There's nowhere for you to run!

Name: Rackam
Origin: You make me sick! There are people living here!

Name: Katalina
Origin: [Djeeta], we can't stay any longer! Let's get the people back to town for now!

Name: Katalina
Origin: We'll take care of these monsters and soldiers on the way. Let's go!
The imperials have given up the chase, but [Djeeta] and the others won't give up hope for the islands.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I think the imperials have stopped chasing us.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Looks that way. But with their plan, they've got us beat, so...

Name: Katalina
Origin: That's enough, Vyrn. It's far too soon for us to give up.

Name: Katalina
Origin: There must be something we can do. I'm sure of it...

Name: Lyria
Origin:
Tiamat...
The guardian of Port Breeze and the primal beast of wind...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I guess now's not the time to fret. We have to keep going!
Lyria believes she may be able to control the primal beast Tiamat, which gives everyone a final ray of hope.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Whew... Everyone's made it back to town.

Name: Katalina
Origin: But we're not in the clear yet...

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's all my fault. If I hadn't hesitated when we were boarding...

Name: Rackam
Origin: We'd be on our way to safety in another archipelago by now.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Cut it out, Rackam! Saying that stuff now won't help anyone.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Everyone trusted me with their lives... and I let them down.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Dang it! Is this really the end? Is there nothing else we can do?

Name: Katalina
Origin: What hope do we have against a primal beast as powerful as a god?

Name: Lyria
Origin: There's still hope. There's something we can do.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria?

Name: Lyria
Origin: I mean, I'm here after all... Right, Katalina?

Name: Katalina
Origin: That's right! But there's no telling what might happen...

Name: Rackam
Origin: What are you talking about?

Name: Lyria
Origin: There's a reason I was a prisoner of the empire.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I have the power to command primal beasts.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wait a sec! I thought primal beasts could only be controlled by their creators, the Astrals!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Yeah. And the Astrals disappeared after the War centuries ago, leaving no descendants.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria's not one of their descendants. Or at least... I don't think she is.

Name: Katalina
Origin: How and why her power works, I can't say. But she has power. That much is certain.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa! [Djeeta], could she be why that primal beast showed up back on Zinkenstill?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Entirely possible... But many mysteries remain. The empire couldn't reach any conclusions about it either.

Name: Katalina
Origin: And there's no telling what might happen if Lyria were to overuse it...

Name: Lyria
Origin: I'll be fine. [Djeeta] is with me... and so are all of you.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Let's go, Rackam. We've got to stop Tiamat, the primal beast of wind!
Lyria's determination is like a shining ray of hope.
Inspired by that hope, they set out to find Tiamat.
研究と駆除というそれぞれの目的の為、サメを探す海洋学者とサメハンター。海洋学者とサメハンターはもともと夫婦だったが、サメに対する立場の違いから別れたのだという。険悪な雰囲気のふたりを心配した一行は、ふたりに協力するため共に小型船で沖を目指す。一行が賑やかに交流する中、海面に何かの影を発見した船長が、「サメが出た」と悲鳴を上げるのだった。
Korean: 연구와 소탕이라는 각각의 목적을 위해, 상어를 찾는 해양학자와 상어 헌터. 해양학자와 상어헌터는 원래 부부였지만, 상어에 대한 입장의 차이로 인해 헤어졌다고한다. 험악한 분위기인 두사람을 걱정한 일행은, 둘에게 협력하기 위해 소형배로 바다를 향한다. 일행이 활기차게 교류하는 가운데, 해면에서 무언가의 그림자를 발견한 선장이 "상어가 나타났다"하고 비명을 지르는 것이었다.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
でも鎧なんて剣呑だなぁ。
自責の念があるのはわかるけどさ。
Korean: 그런데 이 더위에 갑옷이라니 힘들어 보이네. 자제하고 싶은 마음은 알겠는데 말이지.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
はぁ……
君等に何か迷惑でも？
Korean: 뭐...? 그래서 너희한테 피해가는 거라도 있나?

Name: マールート
Origin:
見ててちょっと窮屈かも。
バカンスなのに趣がなさすぎるわ。
Korean: 보고만 있어도 답답해 보여. 바캉스인데 너무 분위기 없다.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あはは！
また天司長に言いたい放題だぜ！
Korean: 아하하! 또 천사장한테 막말한다!

Name: ルリア
Origin:
私はいいと思いますよ？
浜辺の我慢大会にピッタリです！
Korean: 전 괜찮은 것 같은데요? 해변에서 누가 제일 잘 버티나 대회 참가자 같아요!

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
皆ぁ見て見て♪
あっちもこっちも海になったよ！
Korean: 다들, 이거 봐! 여기도 저기도 다 바다밖에 없어!

Name: サリエル
Origin:
陸地が水平線に沈んだ……
こういう景色は昔と一緒だ。
Korean: 육지가 수평선에 잠겼어... 이런 풍경은 옛날하고 똑같네.

Name: 船長
Origin:
絶景だろう。
貸船屋の間でもとっておきの航路でね。
Korean: 절경이지? 낚싯배들 사이에서도 가장 인기있는 항로야.

Name: 船長
Origin:
え～っと……
そこのおふたりさんもどうだい？
Korean: 어... 그쪽 두 분은 어때?

Name: 船長
Origin:
あ～あ……
気まずいねえ……
Korean: 으음... 어색하구만...

Name: 船長
Origin:
沖の指定場所がほぼ一緒で、
適当に相席を組んだんだが……
まさか元夫婦だったなんてよ？
Korean: 지정한 좌표가 거의 비슷하길래 적당히 합승시켰더니만... 설마 이혼한 부부였을 줄이야.

Origin:
その小型船には天司と堕天司、
そしてなぜか一行も乗り合わせていた。
Korean: 이 소형선에는 천사와 타천사, 그리고 어째서인지는 몰라도 단장 일행이 함께 타고 있었다.

Origin:
というのもサメを巡り、
駆除する者と研究する者の対立が、
明らかに不安を掻き立てるもので……
Korean: 상어를 퇴치하려는 자와 연구하려는 자의 대립이 명백한 불안을 이끌어내고 있었기 때문에,

Origin:
そこでひとまず屋台はルシオに任せ、
両者に協力する形になったのだった。
Korean: 당분간 노점은 루시오에게 맡기기로 한 후 양쪽을 중재하기 위해 개입한 것이었다.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
う～んと……
鎧の留め具はこのあたりか？
Korean: 으음... 갑옷 매듭이 여기쯤인가?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
あ、よせ！
無理に脱がせてどうする気だ！
Korean: 아, 하지 마! 왜 억지로 벗기려는 거야!

Name: ビィ
Origin:
まぁちょっと涼んでみろよ。
ここをこうすりゃあいいのか？
Korean: 시원하게 좀 있으라는 거지. 여길 이렇게 풀면 되는 거야?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
痛ッ……
よせと言っている！
仮に脱がせても水着がないだろう！
Korean: 아얏... 하지 말라니까! 그리고 벗었다고 쳐도 수영복이 없잖아!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
俺は脱がん……！
世界が引っ繰り返っても脱がんぞ！
Korean: 난 안 벗어... 세계가 뒤집혀도 절대 안 벗어!

Name: ビィ
Origin:
はぁ？
なんだよノリ悪ぃなあ……
そこまで意地になる事か？
Korean: 뭐...? 진짜 분위기 안 맞춰주네... 이게 그렇게 고집부릴 일이야?

Name: ビィ
Origin:
折角あの争乱のあと、
色々わかりあえたと思ったのによ。
Korean: 그 난리를 겪으면서 겨우 서로를 이해하게 됐다고 생각했는데 말야.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
む……
それとこれとは……
Korean: 윽... 그건 그거고 이건...

Name: ビィ
Origin:
わかったよ、のりわるふぉん。
オイラ他のヤツと遊んで来よっと。
Korean: 알았어. 고집쟁이폰. 난 다른 애들하고 놀아야지.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: ビィ……
Korean: 비이...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
少々意地になっていたか……
だが贖罪をする身で水着など……
Korean: 내 고집이 좀 심했나... 하지만 속죄하는 몸으로 수영복을 걸칠 수는 없...

Name: ビィ
Origin:
隙アリだぜ！
一気に攻め込むぞ[ジータ]！
Korean: 빈틈 발견! 지금이야!

Name: ビィ
Origin: おりゃあぁぁぁ！
Korean: 으랴아아!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: うおぉぉぉ──！？
Korean: 으어어!?

Name: ルリア
Origin:
うん？
ビィさん達が何か騒いでますね。
サメさんが見つかったのかなぁ？
Korean: 어? 비이 씨 쪽이 왠지 소란스러운데요. 상어가 나타난 걸까요?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
心配無用さ。
あっちにはサンダルフォンもいるんだ。
僕達は僕達でアバンチュールといこう。
Korean:
걱정할 거 없어. 저 쪽에는 산달폰도 있잖아. 우리는 우리끼리 아방튀르*를 즐기자고.
(Aventure: 불장난)

Name: ルリア
Origin: あばんちゅーる……？
Korean: 아방튀...르요?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
フフフ……
でもその水着姿は本当にいいね。
君という原石を惹き立たせてる。
Korean: 후후후... 그 수영복 입은 모습 정말 좋다. 너라는 원석을 잘 빛내주고 있어.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
水飛沫を浴びた長い髪も、
太陽の光を反射する白い肌も、
人々の視線を掴んで離さない。
Korean: 물보라를 덮어쓴 긴 머리도, 태양빛을 반사하는 하얀 피부도 사람의 시선을 끌어들여 놓아주질 않네.

Name: ハールート
Origin: もちろん僕の心もね？
Korean: 물론 내 마음도 말이지.

Name: ルリア
Origin:
はわ……？
ありがとうございます……？
Korean: 하와...? 고맙습니다...?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
ピンと来ないかい？
君は本当に磨き甲斐がある。
Korean: 이해가 잘 안 가? 너는 정말 갈고닦는 보람이 있어.

Name: ルリア
Origin:
えっと……
でもは～さんの水着も素敵ですね。
元々スタイルいいなぁと思ってて！
Korean: 어... 그치만 하루씨 수영복도 멋져요. 원래부터 몸매 좋으시다고 생각했지만요!

Name: ハールート
Origin:
光栄だね。
僕の身体に興味を持って貰えるとは。
Korean: 영광인걸. 내 몸에 흥미를 가져 주다니 말야.

Name: ルリア
Origin: きょ、興味というか……
Korean: 흐, 흥미라기보단...

Name: ルリア
Origin:
あ、あはは！
友達にはもちろん興味ありますよ！
そういえば郵便屋さんは順調に──
Korean: 아, 아하하! 물론 친구들에겐 흥미 있죠. 그러고 보니 택배 쪽은 잘 되어가고 계ㅅ...

Name: ハールート
Origin: 触ってごらん。
Korean: 만져 볼래?

Name: ルリア
Origin: さわ……？
Korean: 만져요...?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
君が興味のある箇所を知りたいんだ。
例えば僕の好きなルリアのラインは……
Korean: 네가 흥미있어하는 부분을 알고 싶어. 예를 들면 나는 루리아의 이 라인이...

Name: ルリア
Origin: ひゃはあ！？
Korean: 끼야악!?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
あはは、ごめんごめん！
でも肌の質感も想像以上だね。
Korean: 아하하, 미안 미안! 하지만 상상보다 더 피부 감촉이 좋네.

Name: ルリア
Origin:
はうぅ……
は～さんひどいですよぅ……
なんだか今日は意地悪です。
Korean: 하우우... 하루 씨 너무해요... 오늘따라 장난이 심하시네요.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
フフフ、本当にごめんよ。
原石には摩擦が必要でね。
Korean: 후후후, 진짜 미안. 원석은 연마해줘야 하거든.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
時に丁寧に時に大胆に……
様々な刺激を与えて光り輝かせるんだ。
Korean: 때로는 정성스럽게, 때로는 대담하게... 다양한 자극을 주면서 빛을 내게 하는 거야.

Name: ルリア
Origin: そんなこと知りません……
Korean: 그런 거 몰라요...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
サリたんサリたん♪
あっちでトビウオが跳ねたよ！
Korean: 사리, 사리! 저기서 날치가 날았어!

Name: サリエル
Origin: トビウオ……？

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
わぁお！
イカとタコが並んで泳いでるねえ。
仲がいいねえ。
Korean: 와아! 오징어하고 문어가 나란히 헤엄치고 있네. 사이가 좋구나.

Name: サリエル
Origin: お互い捕食している……
Korean: 서로를 먹어치우고 있어...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
ビックリマンボー！
ウオノタユウがついてきてるよ！
ちょっとウリエル様に似てるね？
Korean: 깜짝 놀랐복치~! 걔복치가 따라오고 있어! 우리엘 님이랑 좀 닮지 않았어?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
うん……
消息を断ってごめん、ウリエル……
Korean: 응... 연락 안 해서 미안해, 우리엘...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
あ、離れてった。
きっと許すって意味だねえ。
Korean: 아, 다른 데로 갔다. 분명 괜찮다는 의미일 거야.

Name: サリエル
Origin: 良かった……
Korean: 다행이야...

Name: サリエル
Origin:
君はとても賢い。
海洋生物についてなんでも知っている。
Korean: 넌 정말 똑똑하구나. 해양생물에 대해서 뭐든지 알고 있네.

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
たまたまだよぉ。
アズは図鑑を読んで勉強中なんだ。
Korean: 어쩌다 그렇게 된 거야. 아즈는 도감을 보면서 공부하고 있거든.

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
まだ途中なんだけど、
空の世界の事がわかっておもちょいよ♪
Korean: 아직 공부중이긴 하지만 하늘의 세계에 대해 알 수 있어서 재미쪄!

Name: サリエル
Origin:
そう……
君達はリミッターが効いていないのか。
Korean: 그래... 너희는 리미터가 걸리지 않은 거야?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
でもなぜ？
どうして？
どうすれば僕も知性を……
Korean: 하지만 왜? 어째서지? 어떻게 하면 나도 지성을...

Name: サリエル
Origin: 彼の真意を……
Korean: 그의 진의를...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
およよ？
サリたん何か悩んでる？
Korean: 어라라? 사리, 뭐 고민 있어?

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
アズはバカだから自信ないけど……
今度イスが起きたら聞いてみようか？
Korean: 아즈는 바보라서 자신 없지만... 다음에 이스 일어나면 물어봐 줄까?

Name: サリエル
Origin: ありがとう……
Korean: 고마워...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
なんだってんだよ！
何年も前の話をいつまでも！
Korean: 그게 어쨌다는 거야! 몇 년이나 된 이야기를 아직까지 들먹이고!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
怒鳴らないで。
あなたの価値観が変わったか確認よ。
Korean: 소리지르지 마. 당신의 가치관이 바뀐 건지 확인하는 거야.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
偉そうに……
サメハンターを野蛮みたいに言うな！
Korean: 잘난 척은... 상어 헌터가 야만스럽다는 듯이 말하지 마.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
あなたこそ。
学者は現実を見ない頭お花畑だなんて！
Korean: 당신이야말로. 학자는 현실을 보지 않고 머리속이 꽃밭이라고 했지!

Name: サメハンター
Origin: その言葉は謝ったろ！
Korean: 그 말에 대해선 사과했잖아!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: その謝罪は断ったわ！
Korean: 그리고 사과 안 받는다고도 했지!

Name: マールート
Origin:
そこまで♪
また話がズレてきたわ。
Korean: 거기까지~ 또 이야기가 이상한 데로 흐르기 시작했어.

Name: マールート
Origin:
つまりおふたりは……
サメを狩る男とサメを愛する女の、
禁断のカップルだったという事ね。
Korean: 즉 두 분은 상어를 잡는 남자와 상어를 사랑하는 여자가 만난 금단의 커플이었다는 얘기구나.

Name: マールート
Origin:
お互い変わると信じて、
でも男は駆除を止めず、
女は研究を基に保護活動を始めた？
Korean: 서로가 바뀔 거라고 믿었지만 남자는 사냥을 멈추지 않았고 여자는 연구를 기초로 보호활동을 시작했다 이거야?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
あぁ。
出会った頃はもっと普通だった。
徐々に虐待とかなんとか非難を……
Korean: 그래. 만났을 때는 좀 더 평범했어. 점점 학대가 어쩌고 비난하기 시작하더니...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ちょっと待って。
先に言ったのはあなたでしょう。
保護活動を偽善だとかなんとか……
Korean: 잠깐 기다려. 먼저 시작한 건 당신이잖아. 보호활동이 위선이라느니 뭐라느니...

Name: マールート
Origin:
重要な争点ね。
仕事について口を出さないルールは、
付き合いたての時期に決めたのよね。
Korean: 중요한 쟁점이네. 서로의 일에 대해서 언급하지 않는다는 룰은 연애하던 시절에 정했던 거랬지.

Name: マールート
Origin:
でも最初の結婚記念日に口が滑って、
そこから口論が増えていったんだわ。
Korean: 하지만 첫 결혼기념일에 말실수가 나왔고, 그 때부터 언쟁이 늘어났다고도 했고.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
あ、あの日は酔っ払ってて……
雰囲気で冗談だとわかるだろ！
Korean: 그, 그 날엔 취해서... 그냥 분위기 타고 한 농담이었다는 거 알잖아!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
本気でも冗談でも許せない。
なんのためのルールなのよ。
Korean: 농담이든 진담이든 용서 못 해. 뭘 위해서 룰이 있는데.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
お互い話のアレで多少は言ってたろ。
だいたいルールは君が先に破ってる。
その時は何も言わずに黙ってたけど……
Korean: 피차 이야기하다가 조금씩 실수했잖아. 애초에 룰은 네가 먼저 깼어. 그 땐 그냥 아무 말도 안 했는데...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
はぁ？
何年も前の話を今更指摘？
ずっと黙ってて頂戴。
Korean: 뭐라고? 몇 년 전 얘기를 이제와서 꺼내? 계속 아무 말도 하지 마시지 그래.

Name: マールート
Origin:
新情報？
聞きたい聞きた～い♪
人間社会についてもっと知りたいわ。
Korean: 새로운 정보? 들려줘, 들려줘~ 인간 사회에 대해서 더 알고 싶어.

Name: 船長
Origin:
オイオイ……
ハイスクールの遠足より賑やかだぜ。
Korean: 이봐... 고등학교 수학여행보다 더 난리가 났는데.

Name: 船長
Origin:
商工会には逆らえねえが、
適当に客を捌いてりゃあこうなるか。
Korean: 상공회의 알선을 거절할 수는 없었겠지만 적당히 사람을 태우면 이렇게 된다니까...

Name: 船長
Origin: 今後は地道にきっちりと──
Korean: 다음에는 착실하게 제대로...

Name: 船長
Origin:
ヒィ！？
出た出た出た……
Korean: 히익!? 나왔어, 나왔어 나왔어!

Name: 船長
Origin: サメが出たぞぉ！？
Korean: 상어 나왔어!!!

Origin: 現れた海洋生物を注意深く観察する一行。しかし海洋生物に敵意は無く、海洋学者の知識から、サメとは別種であることがわかる。海洋生物と交流する中で、その正体は一部の人々の間で「イルカ」と呼ばれている種であることに思い当たる一行。しかし一行が陸に戻ろうとすると、突如巨大なサメ「ブルース」が現れ、船長を飲みこんでしまうのだった。
Korean: 나타난 해양생물을 깊게 관찰하는 일행, 그러나 해양 생물에 적대감은 없었고, 해양학자의 지식으로부터 상어와는 다른 종이라는 것을 알 수 있었다. 해양 생물과 교류하는 가운데, 그 정체는 일부 사람들 사이에서 '돌고래' 라고 하는 종이었다는걸 짐작하는 일행. 그러나 일행이 육지로 돌아가려고하자, 갑자기 거대상어 '브루스'가 나타나 선장을 삼켜버리는 것이었다.

Origin:
船長の悲鳴を聞き、
船首に走った一行。
するとそこにいたのは……
Korean: 선장의 비명을 듣고 일행은 선수로 달려갔다. 그러자 그 곳에는...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
う～ん……
この海洋生物がサメかい？
Korean: 으음... 저 해양생물이 상어야?

Name: マールート
Origin:
えっと……
毎年浜辺を騒がせる害獣？
Korean: 그... 매년 해변을 어지럽힌다는 유해 생물?

Name: 海洋生物
Origin: きゅ～い♪
Korean: 뀨이~

Name: アズラエル
Origin: きゅ～い♪
Korean: 뀨~이!

Name: ルリア
Origin: あはは、きゅ～い♪
Korean: 아하하, 뀨이~

Name: サリエル
Origin:
獰猛には見えない……
この様子は敵意というより好意？
Korean: 사나워 보이지는 않는데... 저 모습은 적의라기보단 호의?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
そのとおりね。
仕草を見ても私達に興味津々だわ。
Korean: 그 말대로야. 행동을 봐도 우리한테 흥미가 많은 모양이야.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
一体どうなってるんだぁ？
サメにも色々な性格のヤツがいるのか？
Korean: 대체 어떻게 된 거야? 상어도 다양한 성격을 가진 녀석들이 있는 건가?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
待て……
油断するな。
Korean: 기다려... 방심하지 마라.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
サメは狡猾で知能が高いんだ。
この愛嬌も演技かもしれない。
Korean: 상어는 교활하고 지능이 높다. 저 친한 척도 연기일지도 몰라.

Name: サメハンター
Origin: サリエル、散弾銃を出せ。
Korean: 사리엘, 산탄총을 꺼내와.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ちょっと！
この子が私達に襲いかかる？
目の前の現実を見なさいよ！
Korean: 잠깐만! 저 애가 지금 우리를 덮치려고 하고 있어? 눈 앞의 현실을 보란 말이야!

Name: サメハンター
Origin: サリエル！
Korean: 사리엘!

Name: 海洋生物
Origin: きゅ～い？
Korean: 뀨~이?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
敵意は本当にないと思う……
君が言っていたサメと違って。
Korean: 적의는 정말 없다고 생각해. 네가 말했던 상어하고는 달리.

Name: サメハンター
Origin: 荷物係が俺に意見するのかよ？
Korean: 짐꾼이 나한테 충고하는 거야?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
意地を張るのもいいが、
サメの生態は詳細不明なんだろう？
Korean: 고집은 알겠지만 상어의 생태는 불명이잖나?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
姿形が似ていようとも、
その役割はまるで異なる場合もある。
Korean: 모습이 비슷하다고 해도 그 역할이 전혀 다른 경우도 있다.

Name: サリエル
Origin: 天司と堕天司のように……？
Korean: 천사하고 타천사처럼...?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
笑わせるなよ。
さっき海に落ちてた癖に真顔で諭すな。
Korean: 웃기지 마. 아깐 바다에 빠졌던 주제에 진지한 얼굴로 설교하지 말라고.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
そのつもりはないよ。
だが本当にサメなのか知る必要がある。
ここは専門家である学者の出番だろう。
Korean: 설교할 생각은 없어. 하지만 정말로 상어인지 알아볼 필요가 있겠지. 여기선 전문가인 학자가 나설 차례 아닌가?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
ほう……
プロの仕事に口を挟むのか？
アンタには多少の責任が発生するぜ？
Korean: 호오... 프로가 하는 일에 끼어들 생각인가? 당신도 책임져야 할 텐데?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
あぁ。
駆除の際は付き合おう。
Korean: 그래. 해치워야 한다면 거들도록 하지.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
サリエル。
君の羽に再生の兆候は？
Korean: 사리엘. 날개가 재생되는 징조는 있나?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
うぅん。
今の僕は飛ぶ事も……
でも最低限の力は残っている。
Korean: 아니, 지금의 나는 날 수도 없어... 하지만 조금의 힘은 남아 있어.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
そうか。
では只の害獣など問題にならん。
Korean: 그렇군. 그럼 평범한 유해생물 정도로는 문제가 되지 않겠군.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
素人ってのは怖いねえ……
まぁその威勢は買ってやるがな。
Korean: 초보자는 이래서 무섭다니까. 뭐 그 자신감만은 인정하겠다만.

Name: 船長
Origin:
あ～……
悪いが俺も口を挟んでいいか？
そろそろ陸に上がる時間だぜ。
Korean: 아... 미안한데 나도 좀 끼어들어도 될까? 슬슬 육지로 돌아갈 시간이야.

Name: 船長
Origin:
次の予約があるんだよ。
こちとら年に一度の稼ぎ時でね──
Korean: 다음 예약이 있거든. 우리도 연중 한번뿐인 성수기라서 말이지...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: 結論は出たわ。
Korean: 결론은 나왔어.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
この距離で観察すると一目瞭然……
完全にサメとは別種の海洋生物よ。
Korean: 이 거리에서 관찰했으니 틀림없어... 완전히 상어와 다른 종의 해양생물이야.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
なんだと？
根拠はなんだ？
Korean: 뭐라고? 근거는 있나?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
側面を見て。
サメにはある筈のエラがないわ。
つまり呼吸の方法が違ってるの。
Korean: 측면을 봐. 상어에 있어야 할 아가미가 없어. 즉 호흡방법이 다르다는 얘기지.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
あと尾ビレもわかりやすいわね。
サメは縦方向に広がってるけど、
この種は横に広がってるでしょう？
Korean: 그리고 꼬리지느러미도 명확한 증거야. 상어는 수직으로 뻗어 있지만 이 종은 수평으로 퍼져 있잖아.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ただの個体差という理屈では、
ここまでの相違点を説明できないわ。
Korean: 단순한 개체별 차이라고 하기엔 이 정도로 차이가 날 수 없어.

Origin:
サメと似た別種の海洋生物──
その存在は空の人々にとって曖昧で、
ハッキリと区別は出来ていなかった。
Korean: 상어와 비슷한 다른 종의 해양생물. 그 존재들은 차이가 애매해서 하늘의 민족들은 그들을 확실히 구분하지 못한 상태였다.

Origin:
学術的な差異も未知だったが、
その生息域に近い住民などは、
感覚で呼び名を変えて認識しており……
Korean: 학술적인 차이도 아직 밝혀내지 못한 상태였지만, 그들이 사는 영역의 주민들은 둘을 다른 이름으로 구별해서 부르고 있었다.

Origin:
[ジータ]達もまた、
その存在を知る団員と話をする中で、
すでに認識はあった事に思い当たる。
Korean: [지타] 일행 또한 그 존재를 아는 단원과 이야기하던 중 들은 적 있는 종이라는 것을 떠올려냈다.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
そうだったの……
フィールドワーク不足だったわ……
Korean: 그랬구나... 필드 워크 부족이야.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
でもなるほどなぁ。
さすが海洋学者だぜ！
Korean: 하지만 역시 해양학자구나!

Name: ハールート
Origin:
空の常識が覆る新発見だよ。
あらゆる図鑑を書き換える程のね！
Korean: 하늘의 상식이 뒤집힐 만한 대발견이야! 수많은 도감을 다시 써야 될 정도라고!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ウフフ。
私が初めて見て虜になった生物も、
本当はこっちの別種だったのかも。
Korean: 후후. 내가 처음 보고 반해버린 생물은 사실은 이 종이었을지도 모르겠어.

Name: マールート
Origin:
きっとそうね。
アズのキグルミはこっちに似てるもの。
Korean: 분명히 그랬을 거야. 아즈 인형옷도 이 쪽이랑 닮았는걸.

Name: サメハンター
Origin: 別種……
Korean: 다른 종이라고...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
さてマーティン？
まだ反論する元気はある？
Korean: 그래서, 마틴? 아직도 반론할 생각이야?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
ハッ……
なんてザマだよ。
Korean: 흥... 이게 무슨 꼴인지.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: マーティン……？
Korean: 마틴?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
とすると俺は今まで、
この別種も狩っちまってた訳だ……
Korean: 그렇다고 하면 난 지금까지 이 다른 종도 같이 잡아버렸다는 얘기잖아...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
何がプロだよ。
無害なヤツを撃ってイイ気になって……
Korean: 어디가 프로라는 거야... 무해한 녀석을 쏴버리고 의기양양했다니...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
学者も混同する見た目なんだろう？
君も責務を果たすため必死だった筈だ。
あまり卑屈になっても良い事はないぞ。
Korean: 학자도 혼동할 정도로 외견이 비슷하잖아? 너도 임무를 수행하기 위해서 필사적이었을 거고. 자기 자신을 질책해 봤자 좋을 게 없어.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
オイラも同感だぜ。
ひねだるふぉんが言うと説得力あるな！
Korean: 나도 동감이야. 비꼼달폰이 말하니까 더 설득력있는걸!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
む……
この後はどうするつもりだ？
Korean: 큭... 이제 어떻게 할 생각이지?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
俺達の用は済んだ……
浜辺で見た魚影はこの別種だろう。
Korean: 우린 상관 없어졌어. 해변에서 봤던 그림자는 이 다른 종이었겠지.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
私達も予定変更よ。
ひとまず別種の存在を前提に、
過去の資料の整理が必要だわ。
Korean: 우리도 예정 변경이야. 우선 다른 종의 존재를 전제로 해서 과거의 자료를 정리할 필요가 있어.

Name: 船長
Origin:
はいよ。
時間きっかりで助かるぜ。
Korean: 알았어. 시간 딱 맞춰줘서 고마워.

Name: 船長
Origin:
嬢ちゃん達！
その別種とバイバイの時間だぜ！
Korean: 아가씨들! 그 친구한테 바이바이할 시간이야!

Name: 海洋生物
Origin: きゅいきゅ～い♪
Korean: 뀨이뀨~이!

Name: アズラエル
Origin: きゅいきゅきゅきゅ？
Korean: 뀨이뀨뀨뀨?

Name: 海洋生物
Origin: きゅっきゅっきゅう！
Korean: 뀨뀨뀨!

Name: ルリア
Origin:
きゅ～い？
きゅるきゅっきゅう？
Korean: 뀨~이? 뀨류뀨뀨?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: なぜ意思疎通できている……？
Korean: 어떻게 의사소통하고 있는 거지?

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あはは！
まぁなんか雰囲気だろ。
でも別種のヤツもずいぶん懐いてるぜ。
Korean: 아하하! 뭐 분위기같은 걸로 아는 거겠지. 그나저나 저 다른 종이라는 녀석 되게 잘 따르네.

Name: 海洋生物
Origin: きゅうぅぅぅ……
Korean: 뀨우우...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
イルカ？
あなたイルカっていうんだね！
Korean: 돌고래? 너 돌고래라고 하는구나!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
イルカ……？
まさか本当に言葉がわかるの？
Korean: 돌고래...? 설마 진짜로 말이 통하는 거야?

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
うぅん。
でも頭の中でちょっと聞こえたよ。
Korean: 아니. 하지만 머리 속에 뭔가 들렸어.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
僕も聞こえた。
星晶獣の気配に近い感覚機能かなぁ。
Korean: 나도 들었어. 성정수의 기운에 가까운 감각기능일까?

Name: マールート
Origin:
たぶん音波かも。
彼等独自の伝達方法があるみたいね。
Korean: 어쩌면 음파일지도. 그들 특유의 전달방법인 모양이야.

Name: イルカ
Origin: きゅ～い！
Korean: 뀨~이!

Name: 船長
Origin:
うん……？
反対側の海面にも魚影が見えたぞ？
音波ってので仲間でも呼んだのか？
Korean: 음...? 반대쪽 해수면에도 물고기 그림자가 보이는데? 음파라는 걸로 친구를 부른 건가?

Name: 船長
Origin:
参ったねえ……
このまま旋回すると当たっちまうぜ。
Korean: 큰일인걸... 이대로 선회하면 부딪치겠어.

Name: 船長
Origin:
お～い！
イルカちゃん達よお！
ちょっとそこをどいて貰えるか──
Korean: 어~이! 돌고래 님들! 잠깐 거기 좀 비켜 줄...

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrrrk！
Korean: Sharrrrk!

Name: 船長
Origin: ぬわあぁぁぁ──！？
Korean: 으아아아아!?

Name: ビィ
Origin:
うわぁ！
なんかでかいのが出て来たぞぉ！？
Korean: 으아! 뭔가 커다란 게 튀어나왔는데?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
船長さんが一口で……！
あの巨大な個体はまさか……
Korean: 선장님이 한입에 먹혔어...! 저 거대한 생물은 설마...

Name: サメハンター
Origin: ブルース──
Korean: 브루스...

Origin: 自在に泳ぎ回り、一行を翻弄するブルース。海洋学者達の保護等に追われる中、逃げ遅れたイルカを気にかけたアズラエルもブルースに飲みこまれてしまう。そのままブルースは潜水して逃走してしまい、一行はアズラエルと船長を救出する為の策を練るのだった。
Korean: 자유자재로 헤엄쳐 다니며 일행을 농락하는 브루스. 해양학자 및 일행을 보호하는 등의 연유로 쫓기던 도중, 늦게 도망친 돌고래를 걱정한 아즈라엘도 브루스에게 삼켜져 버린다. 그대로 브루스는 잠수하여 도주해버려, 일행은 아즈라엘과 선장을 구출하기 위한 대책을 짜는 것이었다.

Origin:
新種の海洋生物イルカと交流する中、
突如として巨大なサメが一行を襲う。
Korean: 새로운 해양 생물 돌고래와 교류하던 중에 갑자기 거대한 상어가 일행을 덮쳤다.

Origin:
その個体こそ史上最悪の害獣であり、
マーティンの怨敵のブルースだった。
Korean: 그것은 사상 최악의 유해 생물이자 마틴의 숙적인 브루스였다.

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrk！
Korean: Sharrrrrk！

Name: ルリア
Origin: きゃあぁぁぁ！？
Korean: 꺄아아!??

Name: ビィ
Origin:
クソぉ！
海に潜ったり飛び出て来たり……
想像以上に厄介だぜ！
Korean: 젠장... 바다에 잠겼다가 날아올랐다가... 생각보다 더 상대하기 힘들어!

Name: ハールート
Origin:
本当に頭が回る……！
自分の利点を完璧にわかってるんだ。
Korean: 진짜 머리 좋은데...! 자기가 유리한 점을 완벽하게 파악하고 있구나.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
[ジータ]達！
ひとまず僕に掴まって！
重量オーバーだけど空に避難するよ！
Korean: [지타]! 그리고 너희들! 우선 날 붙잡아! 중량 오버지만 하늘을 날아서 피난하는 거야!

Name: マールート
Origin:
エレンとマーティンは私よ！
いったん態勢を立て直さないと──
Korean: 엘렌하고 마틴은 나한테 붙어! 일단 태세를 정비해야...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
ブルースよ……
今年も暑い夏の到来だなぁオイ？
Korean: 브루스... 올해도 뜨거운 여름의 시작이군, 그렇지?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: マーティン！？
Korean: 마틴?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
さぁ開幕だ！
お前の終生のライバルがここにいるぞ！
Korean: 자, 개막이다. 네 최고의 라이벌이 여기에 있다!

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrk！
Korean: Sharrrrrk！

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
弾いた！？
去年より胸板が盛り上がってやがる……
Korean: 튕겨냈잖아? 작년보다 가슴 가죽이 더 두꺼워졌군...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
サリエル！
徹甲弾の用意だ！
Korean: 사리엘! 철갑탄을 준비해라!

Name: サリエル
Origin:
うん……
この弾で合ってる？
Korean: 응... 이 탄 맞아?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
サンキュ！
お前は荷物を守ってろ。
絶対前に出て来るなよ？
Korean: 땡큐! 넌 짐 지키고 있어. 절대 앞으로 나오면 안 된다?

Name: サリエル
Origin: 僕は誰も葬らないでいいの？
Korean: 난 아무도 안 죽여도 돼?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
冗談を言ってる場合か！
お前は俺が守ってやる。
そっちの兄ちゃんは空に避難を──
Korean: 농담하고 있을 때가 아냐! 넌 내가 지켜 줄게. 그 쪽 형씨도 하늘로 날아서 도망쳐...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
さすがに落ち着いてるな……
俺に啖呵を切った度胸は本物だったか！
Korean: 확실히 침착한걸. 나한테 충고하면서 했던 말은 진심이었던 모양이지?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: ぼええええ……
Korean: 우우으으윽...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
背中さすりさすり♪
サンちゃん顔が真っ青だねえ。
Korean: 등 쓰담쓰담... 산쨩 얼굴이 새파랗네...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
アズ……！
君も飛んで避難するんだ！
Korean: 아즈...! 너도 빨리 날아서 도망쳐!

Name: マールート
Origin:
ちょっと待って……
まさかアズの羽もまだ再生できてない？
Korean: 잠깐 기다려... 혹시 아즈 날개도 아직 재생 안 된 거 아냐?

Name: イルカ
Origin: きゅ～い……！

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
およ？
あなたも避難するヒマがなかった？
Korean: 어라? 너도 도망갈 시간이 없었어?

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
でもここにいると危険だよ。
急がないとブルースのごはんだよ──
Korean: 그치만 여기 있으면 위험해. 어서 도망치지 않으면 브루스 밥이 될 거...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrk！
Korean: Sharrrrrk！

Name: アズラエル
Origin: およよ？
Korean: 어라라?

Name: ハールート
Origin: アズゥゥゥ！？

Name: マールート
Origin:
なんてこと……
今度はアズも一口で……
Korean: 이럴 수가... 이번엔 아즈를 한 입에...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrk……
Korean: Sharrrrrk……

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
諦めないで！
まだ猶予はある……
魚類に咀嚼する習慣はない筈よ！
Korean: 포기하지 마! 아직 시간이 있어... 어류는 먹이를 씹어서 삼키지 않아!

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
まるっと胃袋に収める訳か！
確かに無傷と言えば無傷だぜ……！
Korean: 그대로 위장에 들어갔다는 소린가! 그야 상처가 없을만도 하겠군...!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
クソ……！
奴の腹を捌いてふたりを救助するぞ……
Korean: 젠장...! 놈의 배를 가르고 두 사람을 구출해내는 거다...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk──
Korean: Sharrrk──

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あ……！
アイツ潜って行っちまったぞ！？
Korean: 아...! 저 녀석 잠수해 버렸어!

Name: サリエル
Origin:
逃走……？
こっちの敵意が強まったから……
Korean: 도주...? 우리 쪽 적의가 강해진 걸 느끼고...

Name: ルリア
Origin:
待って……！
アズさん達を返して！
Korean: 기다려! 아즈 씨랑 선장님을 돌려줘!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: ウオォォォ！
Korean: 우오오오!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
光が届いてないわ……
なんていう潜水速度なの……
Korean: 빛이 닿질 않아... 엄청난 잠수속도야...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
急いで後を追うぞ！
絶対にアズ達を取り戻す！
Korean: 어서 뒤를 쫓자! 아즈네를 반드시 구해내야 해!

Name: ハールート
Origin:
僕は二度と……
友達を失ったりするもんか！
Korean: 나는 두 번 다시... 친구를 잃을 수 없어!

Name: マールート
Origin:
は～ちゃん……
でも海の中ではあまりにも不利よ……
人質が増えて更に救助が困難になる。
Korean: 하쨩... 그치만 바다 속에서는 너무 불리해... 인질이 늘어나면 구하는 게 더 힘들어져.

Name: ハールート
Origin: で、でも……！
Korean: 하, 하지만...

Name: サリエル
Origin:
勝ち目の薄い戦闘は、
戦略を立てて覆せる。
Korean: 승산이 옅은 전투는 전략을 세워서 뒤집는다.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
戦略か……
この突然の襲撃も奴の計算……
Korean: 전략이라... 이 갑작스러운 습격도 놈의 계산 내겠지...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
まるでどこかの狡知を思わせるが、
とすると奴が次に選択する行動は──
Korean: 마치 어딘가의 교지가 생각나는군... 그렇다면 놈이 다음에 취할 행동은...

Origin: 浜辺ではルシオが屋台の店番をしていたが、そこに逃走してきたブルースが現れる。ブルースを追ってサンダルフォンも浜辺に戻るが、ブルースは隙を突いてルシオをも飲みこんで逃走してしまう。その後[ジータ]達はブルース対策のため開かれる商工会の緊急会議に出席することになるが、サンダルフォンは過去にアウギュステを襲った罪悪感から、その場に残るのだった。
Korean: 해변에서 노점을 지키고있던 루시오에게 도망쳐온 브루스가 나타난다. 브루스를 쫓아 산달폰도 해변에 돌아오지만, 브루스는 틈을 노려 루시오도 삼키고 도주해버린다. 그 후, [지타] 일행은 브루스 대책을 위해 열리는 상공회의 긴급 회의에 참석하게 되는데, 산달폰은 과거에 아우규스테를 덮친 죄악감에, 그 자리에 남는 것이었다.

Origin:
ブルースが逃走を図り、
一行が対策を練っている頃……
Korean: 브루스가 도주를 꾀하고, 일행은 그 대책을 짜내기에 여념없던 시각이었다.

Origin:
浜辺の隅にある屋台では、
有り得ない程の行列が出来ていた。
Korean: 해변 끝에 있는 노점에는 상상도 못 할 정도로 줄이 늘어서 있었다.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
ご注文のリンゴジュース10杯です。
かき氷10個は少々お時間を頂きますね。
Korean: 주문하신 사과 주스 10잔입니다. 빙수 10개는 조금 더 기다려 주세요.

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
は～い♪
では待ってる間にルシオ様の御顔……
もっと間近で見ててもいいですか？
Korean: 네~에! 그럼 기다리는 중에 루시오님의 얼굴을 조금 더 가까이서 봐도 괜찮을까요?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
構いませんよ。
どうぞ御堪能を。
Korean: 물론이죠. 마음껏 감상하세요.

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin: ありがとうございます♪
Korean: 감사합니다~

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
ちょっとぉ！
大量注文はずるいわよ！
この行列が見えないの？
Korean: 잠깐! 대량주문은 반칙이야! 이 줄이 안 보여?

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
私だってずっと並んでたんだもん。
一番前の特等席で堪能するために！
Korean: 나도 계속 기다렸단 말이야. 가장 앞쪽 특등석에서 감상하기 위해서!

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
お店の迷惑も考えなさいよ。
かき氷10個なんて重労働よ。
ほんとにわかファンは困るわ……
Korean: 가게에 폐 끼치는 것도 생각 좀 하시지. 빙수 10개라니 무슨 중노동이야. 이래서 신참들은 안된다니까...

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
はぁ？
あなた古参のつもり？
私は三周目なんですけど！
Korean: 뭐? 지금 고참이라고 텃세부리는 거야? 난 줄 서는거 세 번째거든!

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
おふたりとも。
私を巡って争わないで頂きたい。
Korean: 두 분. 저를 두고 다투지 마시길 바랍니다.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
行列では遠目に見る私を。
先頭では間近に見る私を。
視点の変化にも価値はあるものです。
Korean: 줄을 서실 때는 멀리서 보는 저를, 맨 앞에서는 가까이서 보는 저를 감상하세요. 시점의 변화에도 가치가 있는 거랍니다.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
閉店まで通って頂いて構いません。
私は減るものではありませんので。
Korean: 폐점할 때까지 계속 오셔도 괜찮습니다. 저는 닳지 않으니까요.

Name: ファン達
Origin: は～い♪
Korean: 네~에!

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: ファン達
Origin: きゃあぁぁぁ！
Korean: 꺄아!!

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
うん……？
あの海洋生物は……
Korean: 음...? 저 해양생물은...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk……！
Korean: Sharrrk……！

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
その巨体は異常進化ですね。
サンちゃん達を撒いて来たのですか？
Korean: 그 거대한 몸을 보니 돌연변이인 모양이군요. 산쨩 일행을 따돌리고 온 겁니까?

Name: ブルース
Origin: Shark……？
Korean: Shark……？

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
別に敵対するつもりはありませんよ。
空に生きる者には各々の正義がある。
Korean: 딱히 당신과 적대할 생각은 없습니다. 하늘을 살아가는 자들에게는 모두 각자의 정의가 있죠.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
ただ私は屋台を預かっている身であり、
人々を脅かす行為は営業妨害なのです。
Korean: 다만 저는 노점을 맡고 있는 몸이고, 사람들을 위협하는 행위는 영업방해입니다.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
速やかに退散を。
摂理の因果の流るるままに──
Korean: 빠른 퇴장 부탁합니다. 섭리의 인과가 흐르는 대로...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk……！？
Korean: Sharrrk……！？

Name: ルシオ
Origin: 相応の猶予は与えた筈です。
Korean: 분명 충분히 시간을 드렸습니다.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
では速やかに済ませますね。
お客様を待たせているので──
Korean: 그러면 빠르게 끝내죠. 손님들이 기다리고 계시니...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: 待て！
Korean: 기다려!

Name: ルシオ
Origin: サンちゃん……？

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
はぁ……はぁ……
奴の胃袋にはアズラエル達がいる！
まだ生きている筈だ！
Korean: 하아... 하아... 녀석의 위 속에 아즈라엘과 다른 인간이 있어! 아직 살아있을 거다!

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
なるほど。
先に救助せねば攻撃は出来ないと？
Korean: 그렇군요. 먼저 구조하지 않으면 공격할 수 없다는 건가요?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
俺の失態だ……
ルシオは観光客の避難誘導を頼む！
Korean: 내 실책이다... 루시오 너는 관광객들의 피난을 유도해 다오!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
ルシオ？
何をボーッと……
Korean: 루시오? 왜 멍하니...

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
フフフ……
思わぬ感動に少々浸っていたのです。
サンちゃんが初めて私の名を呼んだ。
Korean: 후후후... 잠시 뜻밖의 감동에 잠겨 있었습니다. 산쨩이 처음으로 제 이름을 부르다니.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
…………！
貴様は馬鹿か！？
Korean: ...! 너, 멍청이 아냐?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
今日は御赤飯ですね。
一千年モノのワインも添えて。
Korean: 오늘은 팥밥을 먹어야겠네요. 천 년간 보관한 와인도 곁들여서.

Name: ルシオ
Origin: サンちゃんはアルコールを──
Korean: 산쨩은 알콜을...

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: ルシオの声
Origin: 嗜む──
Korean: 즐기시는지...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: 大馬鹿者ォォォ！？
Korean: 이 멍청한 녀석!!!!!

Name: ビィ
Origin:
なんてこった……
ルシオまでアイツの胃袋かよ……
Korean: 그럴 수가... 루시오도 녀석의 뱃속에 들어갔다니...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
その後ブルースは再び逃走か……
まだ付近に潜んでるんだろうけど……
Korean: 그 뒤에 브루스는 다시 도망쳤나... 아직 근처에 숨어있겠지만...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
商工会の判断で被害は伏せている。
確かに他の観光客は無傷ではあるが……
Korean: 상공회의 판단으로 이 상황에 대해서는 숨기고 있다. 분명 다른 관광객들에겐 피해가 없었다만...

Name: ショップ店員
Origin:
ほんと大迫力だったなぁ！
俺が第一発見者なんだぜ！
Korean: 진짜 박력이 엄청났어! 내가 처음 발견했다니까!

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
でもいい土産話が出来たわ。
後は商工会がなんとかするわよ。
Korean: 좋은 이야깃거리가 생겼어. 이젠 상공회가 어떻게든 하겠지.

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
いつの間にか閉まってたけど、
明日も屋台にルシオ様いるかなぁ？
Korean: 어느 샌가 문이 닫혀 있던데, 루시오 님은 내일도 노점에 계시려나?

Name: ルリア
Origin:
あまり危機感がないですね……
本当に危険だと思うんですけど……
Korean: 위기감이 별로 없네요... 진짜 위험한 상황인 것 같은데요...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
[ジータ]。
悪いが一緒に来て貰えないか？
商工会が緊急会議するんだと。
Korean: [지타]. 미안하지만 같이 와 줄 수 있겠나? 상공회에서 긴급회의를 한다는군.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
私とマーティンは専門家として……
あなたは災厄を救った英雄として。
実は凄腕の騎空士さんだったのね？
Korean: 나하고 마틴은 전문가로서... 당신은 재액에서 세상을 구한 영웅으로서. 사실 엄청난 실력의 기공사라면서?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
[ジータ]。
会議は任せたぞ。
商工会の判断で俺達の戦略も決まる。
Korean: [지타], 회의 잘 부탁한다. 상공회의 판단에 따라 우리 전략이 정해질 거다.

Name: マールート
Origin:
がんばってね！
私達は船の修理をするわ。
ブルースのせいであちこち傷んでて。
Korean: 힘내! 우리는 배를 수리하고 있을게. 브루스 때문에 여기저기 떨어져나갔어.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
ん……
僕は荷物の整備をする。
サンダルフォンはどうする？
Korean: 음... 난 장비를 정비할게. 산달폰은 어떻게 할 거야?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: 俺は……
Korean: 나는...

Origin:
商工会の招致により、
[ジータ]は緊急会議に向かった。
Korean: 단장은 상공회의 초청을 받고 긴급 회의에 참석하러 떠났다.

Origin:
その背を眺めるサンダルフォンは、
かつての罪が脳裏をかすめるのだった。
Korean: 그 등을 지켜보던 산달폰의 가슴 속에는 이전에 지었던 죄가 스쳐 지나갔다.

Origin: The shark hunter and the oceanographer—one seeks to exterminate ocean life and the other, research it. The two were originally husband and wife but ultimately separated due to irreconcilable differences in their relationships to sharks. Concerned about the ill will between the erstwhile couple, the party steps in to mediate. Soon after the group sets sail, their rental boat's skipper sees an ominous form and warns of a shark attack.

Name: Halluel
Origin: I think you're going a bit overboard on the penance, wearing armor in this heat.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Sigh... Am I in any way imposing on you?

Name: Malluel
Origin: It hurts to look at you. A suit of armor doesn't exactly cry vacation after all.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Ahaha! The supreme primarch's gettin' an earful again!

Name: Lyria
Origin: I think his armor's fine. It's like he's doing a beach endurance challenge!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Look, everyone, look! There's water all around us!

Name: Sariel
Origin: The land has sunk below the horizon. This sight reminds me of days gone by.

Name: Skipper
Origin: It's something to behold, ain't it? This passage is a favorite for hired ships.

Name: Skipper
Origin: Sooo... You two still alive back there?

Name: Skipper
Origin: Ah... Not feelin' real talkative, I see...

Name: Skipper
Origin: You both gave me more or less the same coordinates, so I figured why not sail you out together. But you used to be husband and wife, eh?
The archangels, fallen angel, and [Djeeta]'s crew are sailing on the tiny ship.
A simmering conflict between the researcher and shark slayer threatens to become more than just awkward.
The crew has therefore stepped in to mediate, leaving Lucio to tend to the food stand.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hm... Are these the fasteners for your armor?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Stop that this instant! What do you mean trying to undress me without permission!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You oughta let the breeze cool you down a bit. Am I doin' this right?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Ouch! I already asked you to stop! Even if I were to remove my armor, I don't have any swim trunks!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: I have no intention of relaxing my dress code, no matter what the reason!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? What a killjoy... Do you really have to be so stubborn?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: And here I thought we were finally starting to understand each other after that battle.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Ngh... That was then, and this is now.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Okay, Wallflowerphon—you win. I'm gonna go hang out with someone else now.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Vyrn...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Perhaps I'm being too obstinate... But summer levity and swimwear hardly seem appropriate for someone who has yet to atone for his sins...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Now's our chance! Let's get 'im, [Djeeta]!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: What—

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rah!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Aaaugh!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Huh? What are they shouting about over there? I wonder if they spotted a shark.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Sandalphon's with them, so there shouldn't be anything to worry about. Now, I believe I promised you a style consultation.

Name: Lyria
Origin: A... consultation?

Name: Halluel
Origin: Hehehe... You're adorable in that swimsuit. It makes you shine like the gem you are.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Your long locks catch the sea spray, your fair skin reflects the sun—who could pull their eyes away?

Name: Halluel
Origin: I know I can't.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Wow... Thanks, I think?

Name: Halluel
Origin: Don't you think so? You have so much untapped potential.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Um... Your swimsuit's pretty too, Hal. You've always had a nice figure!

Name: Halluel
Origin: I'm honored that you'd take an interest in my looks.

Name: Lyria
Origin: O-oh, well... I mean...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Aha-ha-ha... Of course I'm interested in my friends. Speaking of which, how has APS—

Name: Halluel
Origin: Tell me more.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Huh?

Name: Halluel
Origin: Tell me more about my figure. I'm eager to hear your opinion, Lyria...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Eeeek!

Name: Halluel
Origin: Ahaha, sorry, sorry! You looked so flustered, I thought a little ice cube would cool you down.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Sigh... I can't believe you, Hal. You're being such a bully today...

Name: Halluel
Origin: Hehehe... I'm really sorry. It just takes a bit of friction to polish a gem.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Or maybe I should say, it takes a little grit for an oyster to produce a pearl?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Whatever you say...

Name: Azrael
Origin: Sarry, Sarry! I just saw a flying fish over that way!

Name: Sariel
Origin: Flying fish?

Name: Azrael
Origin: Ooh, that squid and octopus are swimming together. They must be good friends.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Each is hunting the other...

Name: Azrael
Origin: There's a hola mola! And—see—a rising sunfish right behind it! Doesn't that one remind you of Uriel?

Name: Sariel
Origin:
Yes...
Uriel, I'm so sorry for never contacting you...

Name: Azrael
Origin: Ah, they went different ways. It must mean they don't want to hurt each other.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Good...

Name: Sariel
Origin: You're very smart. A treasure trove of facts on sea creatures.

Name: Azrael
Origin: It's nothing special. I've been studying a field guide.

Name: Azrael
Origin: I've still got a lot to learn, but it's really interesting learning about the Sky Realm.

Name: Sariel
Origin: I see... Wait—aren't your limiters working?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Why? How? What can I do to become smarter...

Name: Sariel
Origin: And really understand him...

Name: Azrael
Origin: Hey, what's got you tied up in knots, Sarry?

Name: Azrael
Origin: I'm a dummy, so I can't say much, but... How about we ask Iss when she gets up?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Thank you...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: The hell are you trying to say? That was years ago!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Don't shout at me. I only wanted to know if your way of thinking had evolved.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Get off your high horse... And quit acting like shark hunters are a buncha no-good roughnecks!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: That's rich. Remind me who called scientists a bunch of ivory tower idealists.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I apologized for that!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Well I didn't accept it!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Time out! This conversation is falling apart.

Name: Malluel
Origin: You two were a star-crossed couple: the man who hunts sharks and the woman who loves them.

Name: Malluel
Origin: Each hoped the other would change. But he wouldn't stop exterminating sharks, and her research made her protect them.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Yeah. Everything was normal at first. But then she started saying it was animal abuse, stuff like that.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Hold it right there. You were the one who started it, saying conservation work was hypocritical.

Name: Malluel
Origin: This is a big point of disagreement. Back when you were dating, you agreed not to criticize each other's jobs.

Name: Malluel
Origin: But you let something slip out on your first anniversary, and that's when the arguments really took off.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I was totally soused that day... You know that was only a joke!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: No matter what it was, it was unacceptable. It undermined our whole agreement.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: We both slipped up now and then in the heat of the moment. But you broke the rule first. I didn't say anything at the time, but...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Huh? Then why are you dredging it up now, years later? Go ahead and take it to your grave.

Name: Malluel
Origin: Ooh, new info! Lemme hear, lemme hear! I wanna learn more about mortal society.

Name: Skipper
Origin: Oi, oi! High schoolers on a class outin' aren't as loud as you.

Name: Skipper
Origin: There ain't no fightin' the chamber of commerce... But if only they'd be more selective about customers...

Name: Skipper
Origin: Guess I'll just have to start—

Name: Skipper
Origin: Eek! Look out, look out, look out!

Name: Skipper
Origin: Shark!

The party members closely observe the creature that appeared in the sea. From its friendliness, the oceanographer is able to deduce that it's a member of another species: the dolphin. The boat attempts to return to shore when Old Bruce shows himself and swallows the boat's skipper in a single gulp.
Hearing the skipper's cries, the party runs to the bow of the ship.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Hm... Is that sea creature a shark?

Name: Malluel
Origin: Oh... You mean the dangerous animals that make such a disturbance every year?

Name: Sea Creature
Origin: Squeee!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Squeee!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ahaha, squeee!

Name: Sariel
Origin: It doesn't seem fierce... It's more friendly than hostile.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: You're right. Its behavior suggests it's more curious about us than anything else.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I don't get it. I guess sharks have lots of different personalities.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Not so fast... We need to stay alert.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Sharks are cunning beasts. Any signs of affection you see are just a clever ruse.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Sariel, get the shotgun.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Hey! She's not attacking us, is she? You need to trust your eyes!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Sariel!

Name: Sea Creature
Origin: Squeee?

Name: Sariel
Origin: It's really not hostile at all... This doesn't seem like the sharks you described.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Did I ask for your opinion, caddie?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: You're just being stubborn. The finer points of shark biology and behavior are still largely unknown, aren't they?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: It's possible for creatures to look similar but have different roles.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Like archangels and fallen angels?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: What a joke. Are you going to lecture me after falling headfirst into the brine?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Not at all. But we need to figure out if this is actually a shark. The expertise of a scientist could come in useful.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Heh... Now you're telling a pro how to do his work? If something goes wrong, it'll be on your head too.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Very well. In that eventuality, I'll accompany you on the hunt.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Sariel. Are your wings showing any sign of regrowth?

Name: Sariel
Origin: No... Flying's out of the question for now. But I do have a bit of power left.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: All right. Then the creature shouldn't pose us any real threat.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: You amateurs are terrifying... But you've got guts if nothing else.

Name: Skipper
Origin: Ah... Sorry for interruptin', but we're about to reach the shore soon.

Name: Skipper
Origin: This is the busiest time o' year, and I've got another booking.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: I've reached a conclusion.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: At this distance it couldn't be clearer—whatever that creature is, it's not a shark.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Oh, really? And where's your proof?

Name: Oceanographer
