Korean: 우리들은 그가 지켜낸 것들을 앞으로도 지켜냐가야만 한다.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
いつか人間と海洋生物の間に、
本当の絆が芽生える事を信じて──
Korean: 언젠가 인간과 해양생물 사이에 진짜 신뢰가 피어날 것을 믿으며...

Origin: ──完
Korean: ──끝

Origin: The topic of a swimming ban is raised at the emergency session of the chamber of commerce. Debate stalls, however, after a faction concerned with potential economic damage opposes the ban. When the shark hunter declines to provide any clear guidance, the oceanographer flies into a rage and runs off. [Djeeta] and Vyrn are unsure how to proceed until Sandalphon lobs them a note through a window.
Chamber of commerce delegates have already assembled in a large room in City Hall.
The district chief opens deliberations on how to respond to Old Bruce with a bit of oratory.

Name: District Chief
Origin: It's fair to say, then, that the shark hunters' tireless efforts have reduced the incidence of shark attacks.

Name: District Chief
Origin: Old Bruce, however, is in a class apart. His fury is nigh unstoppable.

Name: District Chief
Origin: We've managed to keep this under wraps, but if his current pattern continues, this year will be the bloodiest yet.

Name: District Chief
Origin: That's why I've called this meeting of the chamber of commerce. We have to consider whether a swimming ban—

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Swimming ban? Are you mad in the head? Vacation season's just kicked off.

Name: Hotelier
Origin: That's preposterous. What about the sweet cha-ching of resort-goer rupies? I shudder to think of our losses.

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: But if our customers aren't safe, business goes bust. Our livelihoods could be on the line if we don't hurry through a swimming ban.

Name: Greengrocer
Origin: After the ban, then what? Our best efforts to destroy the creature haven't gotten us anywhere.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: We're doing everything we can. But Old Bruce has grown larger than we could ever—

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Quit wasting our time with excuses. Don't forget you're the chamber's hired peon. That's why you're here after all.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: My apologies...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? How come you're sayin' sorry? They're the ones who called you here.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: They had their conclusion from the get-go... Almost none of them wanted to hear other opinions.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: They only ever wanted an expert to sign off on their pet plan... Is money their only priority? Are they going to ignore the danger?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Who can say...

Name: Hotelier
Origin: It might be best to have the district chief announce a wait-and-see policy.

Name: Greengrocer
Origin: That wouldn't solve a thing. But, well, it would be pointless to act without a plan anyway...

Name: District Chief
Origin: Hold on now. We can't rush to a conclusion. First we have to give all opinions equal consideration.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Everyone! I have a suggestion.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: E-Ellen?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: The reason we're dealing with these attacks is that new tourist attraction development hasn't taken the sharks' habitat into account.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: There's still so much we have yet to understand about the ocean... As a matter of fact, we discovered a new species not long ago.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: The time has come to reconsider how we go about beachside development and to establish a marine life reserve.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: This is far from a quick fix, but if Old Bruce feels like his territory is safe...

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Yes, yes, yes. That's a lovely proposal. Let's add it to the agenda of the next chamber of commerce session.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Th-thank you. But that's nearly six months away, and...

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: District Chief, we've reached a consensus. We'd like you to announce a wait-and-see policy.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey, not so fast! Weren't you listening to what she said? And we didn't get a chance to say nothin' neither!

Name: Hotelier
Origin: We're all busy people, you know. Got something to say, shark hunter?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Y-yes... Unless we deal with the cause of the attacks, any solution is going to be...

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: What's that? I can't hear you.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I beg your pardon... You see, a swimming ban could be a life-or-death matter for the islanders...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Which is to say... Maybe we could leave things as they are...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martin!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Quiet... For now we need to let the chamber be...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: You lowlife!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ah, damn it... Wait, Ellen!

Name: District Chief
Origin: Ellen! Martin!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wh-what are we gonna do, [Djeeta]? Both of them just ran off!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? What's this? A wad of paper just flew in the window.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: There's a buncha scribbles on it... Think it's just trash? Should I toss it?

Name: Sandalphon's Voice
Origin: Cough, cough! Read! Cough! The solution! Cough!

While the emergency session of the chamber of commerce is still underway, the oceanographer storms past Lyria and the others, followed by the shark hunter. The two butt heads at first, but their love is rekindled when the shark hunter reveals that he hasn't given up on dealing with Old Bruce. [Djeeta] and company return soon after, state they pushed an overnight swimming ban through the chamber of commerce, and then relate Sandalphon's plan.
While [Djeeta] and Vyrn are away, Lyria and the others work intensively to ready the boat.
But even as their task nears completion, things seem to be at a standstill.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Sigh... I guess the meeting hasn't ended yet.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Nope... If we don't hurry, Az and the others are going to be in real trouble...

Name: Malluel
Origin: We still have some time... Ellen's research suggested that sharks' digestion is really slow.

Name: Malluel
Origin: I'm sure that Az and the others are still alive. They're waiting for us to save them!

Name: Sariel
Origin: Ngh... Next time I'll be fighting out front.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Don't come anywhere near me!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Wait, I said! Calm down and let's talk this over.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Is that Ellen and Martin? They're headed for the rocky area by the shore.

Name: Malluel
Origin: Looks like they're locking horns. What do you say we go and check it out?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: What was that statement of yours supposed to be? You only cared about getting on the delegates' good side!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I apologize for disappointing you... I don't like myself very much now either.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: But they're my employers. Their whims can add digits to my income or subtract them.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: So this is all about money to you? Didn't you have a change of heart when you learned about the dolphins? Or was that just an act?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: No, of course not! But wearing my heart on my sleeve wouldn't have done a bit of good back there. We have to think of another method.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Another method? The chamber of commerce is just going to let the situation fester. It's not like there's anything we can do.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: There is. It's going to be an uphill battle without any official support, but...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Old Bruce is still attacking the beach. He's lurking under the surface and waiting for the chance to strike.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: We've still got Hal and Mal. We'll ask them to serve as scouts, and that way we can get the drop on him.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martin... You already had a strategy?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Did you just capitulate so they wouldn't get upset and slap restrictions on you?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: That's how working men have to get ahead. I could tell that meeting was going nowhere fast. Let's get [Djeeta] and the others to lend us a hand.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Teehee... It's men like you...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: What is it?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Do you remember when we first got together? You always had a backup plan for everything—whether it was for a rainy day or a restaurant closing early.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: So much of the time you're sloppy and quick to anger... But you're calm and proactive when it really counts.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Of course I am. Nothing matters to me more than you.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: It never has... And now, right now...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martin...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ellen...

Name: Malluel
Origin: Aww! They've overcome their differences to fall in love again.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yi-yi-yikes! They're really locking lips...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Are they eating each other?

Name: Halluel
Origin: That's what they call a sign of love. Don't fallen angels do that too?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Mmph... What are you all doing here!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Wh-what! Were you peeking at us from behind the rocks the whole time?

Name: Malluel
Origin: Thanks for the show! It was really educational.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ahaha... I'm sorry... At first we just followed you to stop you from fighting...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ah, well... No one can question your ability as scouts.

Name: Halluel
Origin: We heard everything you said. We'll take care of recon for Old Bruce.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Thank you. Our last problem's what to do about the tourists on the beach...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: This is a war zone. That monster won't hesitate to use people as shields. When he does, it'll place some hard limits on our strategy...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: You don't need to worry. There's a swimming ban in effect until tomorrow morning.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: What? You mean that the chamber of commerce approved it!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yep! Sandalphon was eavesdropping on the meeting from outside the window.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: He chucked a wad of paper inside, and we read his proposal out loud.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: It wasn't anything so grand as a proposal. It just stated that I'd end this all in a night...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: The rescue and the extermination both.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Oh? Did you think up some sort of strategy?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Heh... Leave everything to me.

That night the party starts implementing its strategy to rescue those swallowed and relocate Old Bruce to an area not frequented by people. After they find the colossal shark some distance off the shore, assistance from the dolphin enables them to extract Azrael, the skipper, and Lucio from Bruce's stomach.
The boat sets sail on a mission to end the shark attacks in a single night.
The first step is to locate the target; the second, to rescue allies from his belly; the third, to take the beast into captivity.
At the end they plan to release Old Bruce into a remote, unfrequented area of the sea.

Name: Halluel
Origin:
...!
That giant dorsal fin...

Name: Halluel
Origin: There he is! We've gotta let Mal know right away!

Name: Malluel
Origin: That's it—Hal's signal!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Judging from the light's wavelength... Bruce is currently heading south!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: All right. Just as I imagined, he was right under our noses.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: First, I'll head him off. Everyone else, you prepare to take him into captivity.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Sure thing. What do you actually plan to do though? We haven't heard any specifics.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Just sit back and watch. My secret plan is based on two thousand years of knowledge and personal experience.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Haaaah!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Ooold Bruuuuce!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Hnnhh!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh! What the heck's he doin'?

Name: Lyria
Origin: It looks like he's just flying in circles around Old Bruce's head...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: His seasickness must have inspired him to make Bruce dizzy.

Name: Sariel
Origin: He wants to make the fish lose its lunch?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Haaahhh!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Nnnhhh!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa! Old Bruce is comin' this way!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Some secret plan! That was never gonna work!

Name: Sariel
Origin: Should I capture it already? I'm going to intervene...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ah! Wait! There's something coming from that direction!

Name: Lyria
Origin: That sound—

Name: Dolphin
Origin: Squeeee!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Is that you, Dolphin?

Name: Dolphin
Origin: Sq-squ-squeee...

Name: Halluel
Origin: What's that noise? I can feel vibrations inside my head...

Name: Malluel
Origin: Something's happening... but I don't know what. The world's starting to spin...

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shaaa—

Name: Azrael
Origin: Gweh-heh!

Name: Hal & Mal
Origin: Az!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Oyoyo! It's you guys... Am I alive?

Name: Dolphin
Origin: Squeee! Squeee!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Oh, ultrasonic waves! They interfered with Old Bruce's inner ears, causing him to feel sick and vomit out Az.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Now's our chance! Time to go in closer. We're gonna pull out the skipper and Lucio!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Okay! Sandalphon, get back to the ship!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Bleeeech...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Don't tell me you're queasy too!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin:
Shark...
Shark! Shark! Shark!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh no! Old Bruce has recovered!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: What? Should we have kept our distance?

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sariel
Origin: There you go. Just keep saying ah...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Sorry.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa... He stuck his whole arm down Old Bruce's throat... And he's holding his jaw open like it's nothin'.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Sariel, partner... Who in the world are you?

Name: Halluel
Origin: You don't know? He used to be one of the strongest primal beasts around...

Name: Malluel
Origin: Look! Sariel's got something!

Name: Skipper
Origin: Bwah-heh!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Skipper!

Name: Sariel
Origin: One left to go... But it feels like he's stuck further in...

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Urp... I'm going to apply pressure to his stomach.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sandalphon! How're you gonna do that?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: By hitting him!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shaaa—

Name: Sariel
Origin: Sandalphon... Can you pull your punch a bit? Don't injure him any more than necessary.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: I won't...

Name: Lucio
Origin: Sandy... Are my words reaching you?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Lucio?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Do I have your attention? You mustn't apply pressure there.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Because if you do, you'll cause the shark to excrete...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: What?

Name: Halluel
Origin: Excrete? Oh, you mean when animals finish digesting and—

Name: Malluel
Origin: Stop! That sort of language isn't okay in public. Any mortal knows that.

Name: Azrael
Origin: Poopie?

Name: Lucio
Origin: You understand, don't you? That if you were to hit the creature there, the results would be—

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: So what!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hahaha... You're as reckless as ever.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa... Talk about a rough day. Lemme buy you a juice later.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ahaha... I'm so happy you're all okay!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: R-right! And now it's time to capture Old Bruce!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: What? You still plan to defy us, shark?

Name: Sariel
Origin: It must be the sudden empty stomach... I think he's hangry.
Old Bruce continues to attack the boat. [Djeeta]'s party responds with force, attempting to weaken the colossal shark in order to transport him to a marine sanctuary.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Blast... At this rate, we'll all be shark food!

Name: Halluel
Origin: Ellen! If we don't turn the tables soon... He'll sink the ship before we capture him.

Name: Malluel
Origin: I do feel bad... But if we don't weaken him a bit, we won't be able to take him to the reserve.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: In other words... Fighting's our only option.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We're super skyfarers. We know how to dish out the tough love—and not make it too big a helping!

Name: Lyria
Origin: That's right! We've done this a few times before!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: All right...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Martin?

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: [Djeeta]! Lure Old Bruce up onto the deck! We'll finish this there!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Good luck, everyone!

The party and [Djeeta] succeed at weakening Old Bruce, but the gigantic shark's attacks show no sign of diminishing. To break the stalemate, the shark hunter dives into the beast's mouth clutching a barrel bomb and lets it blow. The chaos subsides, and Auguste is freed from the menace of the sharks.

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark...

Name: Halluel
Origin: Huff... Huff... It's about time you gave up!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Please... We're not trying to destroy you!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Oyoyo? I think he's cooled off a bit.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Sigh... Looks like he's finally calmed down.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Sariel. Could you bring the rope? I'm going to lash Old Bruce to the ship.

Name: Sariel
Origin:
...!
Sandalphon!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Eek! I think this is his last burst of power...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: The beast! After all that, he was only pretending to be defeated...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yeah, he's awful crafty! Almost like a certain Grumplephon!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin:
...!
I've already apologized for that!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Out of the way, kiddo. I've got this.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martin? What are you holding in your—

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Hey, Old Bruce... How many years ago did we first meet? This little quarrel of ours has gone on long enough.

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark! Shark! Shark!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Haha...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ellen's research taught me something: you're only doing what your instincts tell you. If anyone's wrong here, it's us people.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Now with that out of the way...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Martin? Your special gear...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I've got a barrel bomb with your name on it, fishface!

Name: Lyria
Origin: B-barrel...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Aaaah!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: You idiot! What good will it do flinging yourself into his mouth!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martiiiin!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: That summer the beaches of Auguste were made safe by a short-tempered hero with a divorce under his belt and a passion for life in his heart.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: For many years to come, islanders will surely sing the praises of the valiant who dove into Old Bruce's mouth carrying explosives.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: His legacy must not be taken for granted.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: One day the creatures of land and sea will surely find a truer peace...
The End
[ジータ]一行のいる浜辺に、続々と襲来する羽の生えたサメ達。応戦する[ジータ]一行のもとにアウギュステ区長が現れ、観光客達に向かって、区役所に避難するよう呼びかける。サンダルフォンの提案により、[ジータ]達は観光客を先導して避難させることになり、サンダルフォンはひとり浜辺に残りサメを食い止めようとするのだった。
Korean: [지타] 일행이 있는 해변에 계속해서 내습하는 날개달린 상어들. 맞서 싸우는 [지타] 일행에게 아우규스테 구장이 나타나, 관광객들을 향해 구청으로 피난을 알린다. 산달폰의 제안에 따라, [지타] 일행은 관광객들을 선도하여 대피시키게 되어, 산달폰은 혼자 해변에 남아 상어를 저지하는 것이었다.

Name: サメ
Origin: ShaShaSharrrk！
Korean: ShaShaSharrrk！

Name: ショップ店員
Origin:
うわぁぁぁ！
あっちにもこっちにも飛んで来たぞ！？
Korean: 으아아악! 여기저기에서 날아오고 있어!

Name: レストラン店員
Origin:
ぎゃあぁぁぁ……！
俺の海パンを返せえええ！？
Korean: 으아아아! 내 수영복 돌려줘!!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: はあぁぁぁ！
Korean: 하아아!

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark……！？
Korean: Shark……！？

Name: サメハンター
Origin: おらおらおらぁ！
Korean: 으랴라라!

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
クソ……
一体奴等に何が起こっている！？
Korean: 젠장... 대체 놈들에게 무슨 일이 일어난 거지?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
知るか！
羽が生えてる種なんて初めて見たが……
この数が沖に潜んでたなんて有り得ん。
Korean: 나도 몰라! 날개가 달려 있는 종은 처음 봤는데... 이 정도의 수가 바다 속에 있었다니 말도 안 돼.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
何が言いたい？
昨日今日でいきなり羽が生えたとでも？
Korean: 무슨 뜻이지? 어제오늘 사이에 갑자기 날개가 달렸다는 건가?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
俺だってわかるかよ！
とりあえず兄ちゃん達は東側を頼む！
Korean: 나도 모른다니까! 일단 형씨네는 동쪽을 부탁해!

ちょっと待った。
戦力を割いた所で観光客がいちゃあ、
サンダルフォンも本気を出せないぜ。
Korean: 잠깐 기다려. 전력을 나눠도 관광객이 있으면 산달폰이 힘을 다 못 써.

Name: ルリア
Origin:
まずこのばたばたの状況をなんとか……
皆さんに落ち着いて貰わないとですね。
Korean: 우선 이 정신없는 상황을 정리해야죠... 모두 진정시켜야 해요.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: あ、ああ……
Korean: 어, 그래...

Name: ビィ
Origin:
なんだ？
何をきょとんと見てるんだよ？
Korean: 뭐야? 뭘 멍하니 보고 있어?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
なんというか……
君等は妙に冷静だな。
騎空士にとっても異常事態なんだろう？
Korean: 뭐랄까... 너희는 이상할 정도로 냉정하군. 이건 기공사들에게 있어서도 평범한 사태가 아닐 텐데?

Name: ルリア
Origin:
あはは。
確かに異常は異常ですけど……
Korean: 아하하. 분명 이상사태이긴 한데요...

Name: ルリア
Origin:

お魚さんとも色々あったので。
Korean: 여름에는 창어라던가 셩게라던가... 해산물 사건이 여러 가지 있었거든요.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
は……？
魚介類と色々……？
Korean: 뭐...? 해산물하고 여러 가지 일이 있었다고...?

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あったあった！
守畏禍なんてのもいたなぁ。
Korean: 맞아 맞아! 수우박같은 것도 있었지.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ブルースはいきなりでビビったけど、
オイラ達の夏はいつもこんなもんだぜ。
Korean: 브루스는 갑자기 튀어나와서 깜짝 놀랐지만, 우리 여름은 늘 이런 식이야.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
ははは……
お前達は例の騒動にも絡んでたのかよ。
Korean: 하하하... 너희는 그 사건들에도 얽혀 있었던 거냐.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: この世界は狂っている……
Korean: 이 세계는 미쳤어...

Name: 区長
Origin:
観光客の皆様！
急いで区役所に避難を！
この島で最も頑丈です！
Korean: 관광객 여러분! 어서 구청으로 피난하십시오! 이 섬에서 가장 안전한 곳입니다!

Name: ルリア
Origin: あ、区長さん！
Korean: 아, 구장님!

Name: 区長
Origin:
皆さん！
ご無事で良かった……！
Korean: 여러분! 무사해서 다행입니다...!

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
区役所を開放するのか。
いい判断だが誘導は間に合ってるのか？
Korean: 구청을 개방하는 건가. 좋은 판단이지만 제때에 피난시킬 수 있을까?

Name: 区長
Origin:
正直に言えば準備は不完全だ……
職員達が避難勧告に回っているが、
この状況にどこまで対応できるか。
Korean: 솔직히 말하자면 준비가 불완전하다. 직원들을 피난 유도하라고 내보냈지만 이 상황에서 어디까지 대응 가능할지는...

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
なるほど……
小型とはいえ奴等は第一級の害獣だ。
職員は必ず傭兵と一緒に行動させろ。
Korean: 알겠어... 소형이라고는 하지만 놈들은 제1급 유해 생물이다. 직원들은 반드시 헌병과 함께 행동시켜.

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
[ジータ]達。
ここの観光客の誘導を頼めるか？
Korean: [지타], 너희들은 여기 관광객들의 피난유도를 맡아줄 수 있겠나?

Name: ビィ
Origin:
任せろ！
区役所まで案内すりゃあいいんだろ？
Korean: 우리한테 맡겨! 구청까지 안내해 주면 되는 거지?

Name: 区長
Origin:
ありがとう！
あの災厄を救った皆さんの力をどうか！
Korean: 고맙네! 그 재액을 막아낸 여러분의 힘을 부디 빌리고 싶군!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
[ジータ]。
君が人間達の先導を。
俺は残り殿を務める。
Korean: [지타]. 네가 인간들의 유도를 맡아라. 나는 후방을 맡겠다.

Name: ルリア
Origin:
しんがり……？
まさかサンダルフォンさん……
Korean: 후방이요...? 설마 산달폰 씨...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
自分を虐めるつもりはないよ。
シンプルに俺が最も機動力を有する。
Korean: 자기학대를 하려는 건 아냐. 심플하게 내가 가장 기동력이 뛰어날 뿐이지.

Name: ビィ
Origin:
まぁ確かに……
でもヤバイ時は合図とか出せよ？
オイラが飛んで来るぜ！
Korean: 뭐 그건 그렇네... 그치만 위험할 때는 신호 보내야 된다? 우리가 날아갈게!

Name: ルリア
Origin: 私も飛んで来ます！
Korean: 저도 날아갈게요!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
フ……
了解だ。
では作戦を開始するぞ！
Korean: 훗... 알았다. 그럼 작전을 시작하지!

Name: 区長
Origin:
本当に助かります。
だが無理はせず自分の身の安全も──
Korean: 정말 감사합니다. 하지만 무리하지 말고 자기 몸의 안전도...

Name: 区長
Origin:
うん……？
その顔はどこかで……？
Korean: 음...? 그 얼굴은 어디서 본 것 같은데...?

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
ここは直に戦場になる。
[ジータ]達について行動を。
Korean: 여기는 곧 전장이 될 거다. 단장 일행과 함께 행동해라.

Name: 区長
Origin: ……わかった。
Korean: ...알았다.

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: はあぁぁぁ──！
Korean: 하아아!

Origin: 街の中で、海洋学者達を区役所へ避難させようとするハールートとマールート。しかし日焼けで羽が出せないことに気づき、一旦地下のバーに逃げ込む。海洋学者が「サメに羽が生えたのは沖に隕石が落ちたことによる突然変異ではないか」と気づいたとき、突如床からサメが現れる。襲われる海洋学者だったが、間一髪でサメハンターが助けに入り事無きを得るのだった。
Korean: 마을 안에서, 해양학자 일행을 구청으로 피난시키려는 하루트와 마루트. 하지만 햇볕에 손상된 날개를 펼칠 수 없다는걸 알게되어 일단 지하의 술집으로 도망친다. 해양학자가 "상어에 날개가 생긴 것은 운석이 떨어져서 생긴 돌연변이가 아닐까"하고 깨달았을때, 갑자기 바닥에서 상어가 나타난다. 습격당하는 해양학자에게 간발의 차로 상어 헌터가 나타나 무사히 구해진 것이었다.

Origin:
裏街道にもまた青き害獣が降り注ぎ、
餌を求め低空飛行で練り歩いていた。
Korean: 뒷골목에도 푸른 상어들이 날아내려와 저공비행으로 먹이를 찾아헤매며 쑤시고 다녔다.

Origin:
その光景に恐怖する人々は、
無我夢中で逃走するものの……
Korean: 그 광경을 보고 공포에 질린 사람들은 정신없이 도망쳤지만...

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
こっちの道も駄目……
また奴等がうようよいる！
Korean: 이 쪽 길도 틀렸어... 녀석들이 우글거리고 있어!

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
あっちも無理だわ……
私達の行き先を読んでるみたいに……
Korean: 저 쪽도 무리야... 마치 우리가 가려는 방향을 읽는 것 같아...

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: ハールート
Origin: させるか！
Korean: 그럴 수는 없지!

Name: マールート
Origin:
さすがに困ったわね……
我がもの顔で街を泳いでるみたいだわ。
Korean: 이건 좀 난감하네... 마치 자기네 안방처럼 거리를 돌아다니고 있어.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
有り得ない……
羽なんて海洋生物の構造上は……
Korean: 말도 안 돼... 날개같은 건 해양생물의 구조상...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
でも可能性があるとすると……
確か前に読んだ論文の仮説で……
Korean: 하지만 가능성이 있다고 해도... 분명 전에 읽었던 논문 가설에서는...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
皆！
ここは僕が飛び回って陽動する。
Korean: 다들 잘 들어! 여기는 내가 날아다니면서 시선을 끌게.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
その隙にま～ちゃんは、
エレン達を区役所に避難させて。
Korean: 그 사이에 마쨩은 엘렌이랑 다른 사람들을 구청으로 피난시켜.

Name: マールート
Origin:
わかったわ！
は～ちゃんも気をつけてね。
Korean: 알았어! 하쨩도 조심해야 돼.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
うん。
指教の天司が機動力で劣る訳には──
Korean: 응. 지교의 천사가 기동력으로 질 리가...

Name: ハールート
Origin: 痛ッ！？
Korean: 아얏!?

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
は～ちゃん！
何が起きたの、背中が痛いの？
Korean: 하쨩! 무슨 일이야, 등 아파?

Name: ハールート
Origin: なんてことだ……
Korean: 이게 어떻게 된 거지...

Name: ハールート
Origin: 背中が日に焼けて羽が出ない……！
Korean: 등이 햇빛에 타서 날개가 안 나와...!

Name: マールート
Origin:
ウソ……！？
まさか私も──
Korean: 그럴 수가...! 설마 나도...

Name: マールート
Origin: きゃあ！
Korean: 꺄악!

Name: アズラエル
Origin: ま～ちゃん……！

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ふたりとも無理は禁物よ！
ひとまずどこか屋内に避難を……
Korean: 두 사람 모두 무리하면 안 돼! 일단 어딘가 실내로 도망쳐서...

Name: マスター
Origin:
こっちだ！
お嬢さん達も急いで！
地下のバーを一時避難所にする！
Korean: 이 쪽으로! 아가씨들, 어서 서둘러! 지하의 바로 일단 도망치자고!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
あなたは……
わかったわ！
Korean: 당신은...! 알았어!

Name: マールート
Origin:
はぁ……
地下の空間なら安全そうね……
Korean: 하아... 지하 공간이라면 안전하겠네...

Name: アズラエル
Origin:
ふたりとも背中を見せて？
エレンの軟膏ぬりぬりするよ。
Korean: 둘 다 등 보여줘. 엘렌이 준 연고 문질문질 해줄게.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
ありがとう。
でもまさか羽が出せないなんて……
Korean: 고마워. 하지만 설마 날개가 나오지 않을 줄이야...

Name: ハールート
Origin:
ひょっとすると二千年もの間、
誰も気づかなかった設計ミス？
Korean: 설마 이천 년간 아무도 눈치채지 못한 설계 미스인가?

Name: マールート
Origin:
バカンスは想定になかったのかも。
あるいは下位天司に限った話とか……
Korean: 바캉스는 설정에 없었을지도 몰라. 아니면 하위천사에 한정된 이야기일 수도 있고...

Name: マールート
Origin:
研究所に苦情を言いたい所だけど、
私達の今の生活自体が特別だもの。
イレギュラーは今後も有り得るわね。
Korean: 연구소에 컴플레인 걸고 싶지만 우리 생활 자체가 이미 특별해졌는걸. 앞으로도 이런 이레귤러가 생길 수 있겠지.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
イレギュラーね……
あの羽もきっと論文のとおり……
Korean: 이레귤러라... 그 날개도 분명 논문대로야...

Name: アズラエル
Origin: エレン？
Korean: 엘렌?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
あ、あぁごめんね。
あのサメ達の羽について考えてたの。
Korean: 아, 미안해. 그 상어들의 날개에 대해서 생각하고 있었어.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
アレは“突然変異”の可能性が高いわ。
本来は遺伝の過程で起きるものだけど。
Korean: 그건 "돌연변이"일 가능성이 높아. 원래는 유전과정에서 일어나는 거지만...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
でも原因は一体……
沖で何か異常事態があったのかも……
Korean: 하지만 원인은 대체 뭘까. 바다에서 어떠한 이상사태가 일어났을지도 몰라...

Name: マスター
Origin:
異常事態？
そういえば今朝がた沖で地震があった。
漁師の話では強い光と爆発音も……
Korean: 이상사태? 그러고 보니 오늘 아침에 바다에서 지진이 났었어. 어부 이야기로는 강한 빛과 폭발음도 있었다고...

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: 光、地震、爆発……？
Korean: 빛, 지진, 폭발...?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
…………！
まさか沖に隕石が落ちた……！？
Korean: ...! 설마 바다에 운석이 떨어졌나...!?

Name: アズラエル
Origin: いんせき？
Korean: 운석?

Name: マスター
Origin:
なるほど……！
遥か天空に存在する謎の物質が落ち、
あの数を一気に突然変異させたのか。
Korean: 그렇군...! 머나먼 하늘 위에 존재하는 의문의 물질이 떨어져 저만큼의 수를 순식간에 돌연변이로 만든 건가.

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
悪夢みたいな話……
まさか自分の身近で起こるなんて……
Korean: 악몽같은 이야기야... 설마 내가 있는 곳에서 일어날 줄이야...

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
でも現実よ……
他に原因は思いつかないもの。
Korean: 하지만 현실이야... 다른 원인이 떠오르질 않는걸.

Name: アズラエル
Origin: そうかなあ？
Korean: 그런가?

Name: ハールート
Origin:
まぁ原因は置いといて……
このバーを拠点に避難活動を始めよう。
Korean: 뭐 원인은 그렇다치고... 이 바를 거점으로 피난활동을 시작하자.

Name: ハールート
Origin:
幸い食糧も豊富に揃ってる。
もちろんマスターの同意が前提だけど。
Korean: 다행히 식량도 풍부하게 갖춰져 있어. 물론 마스터의 동의가 필요하겠지만.

Name: マスター
Origin:
お客様あっての商売さ。
商工会の会議では力不足だったが……
今度こそ君達に協力させて貰いたい。
Korean: 손님이 있어야 장사도 하는 거지. 상공회 회의에서는 도와주지 못했지만... 이번에야말로 너희들의 힘이 되어주고 싶군.

Name: マールート
Origin:
ウフフ♪
マスターさんカッコイイ！
Korean: 우후후. 마스터 씨 멋있어!

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
ありがとう。
私達も何か協力を──
Korean: 고맙다. 우리도 뭔가 도움을...

Name: ルシオのファン
Origin:
何……？
また地震なの……？
Korean: 뭐야...? 또 지진이야...?

Name: ルシオの古参ファン
Origin:
待って。
そこの床板がガタガタ動いてるわ。
地面に何か……
Korean: 기다려. 저 쪽 바닥이 삐걱거리고 있어. 바닥에서 뭔가가...

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark！
Korean: Shark！

Name: マールート
Origin:
ウソ……！？
サメがモグラみたいに出て来たわ！
Korean: 거짓말이지...? 상어가 두더지처럼 튀어나왔어!

Name: ハールート
Origin:
まさか地面を掘って……
土の中を泳いで来たというのか！？
Korean: 설마 지면을 파고들어서... 땅 속을 헤엄쳐 왔다는 거야?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
なんてこと……
とんでもない形の突然変異だわ……！
Korean: 그럴 수가... 말도 안 되는 형태의 돌연변이야!

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: アズラエル
Origin: 危ないエレン！？
Korean: 엘렌, 위험해!

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
エレン！
怪我はないか！
Korean: 엘렌! 다친 데는 없어?

Name: 海洋学者
Origin:
あ……
私まだ生きてる……？
Korean: 아... 나 아직 살아있는 거야?

Name: サメハンター
Origin:
あぁ生きてる。
俺より先に逝かせてたまるか。
Korean: 그래. 살아 있어. 나보다 먼저 보낼 수는 없지.

Name: 海洋学者
Origin: マーティン……！

Name: サメハンター
Origin: エレン……！

Name: アズラエル
Origin: ちゅうちゅう。
Korean: 쪽쪽~~

Name: マスター
Origin:
フ……
最高にアツイぜ、おふたりさん。
Korean: 후... 두 분, 최고로 뜨겁군.

Origin: [ジータ]一行とハールート達が合流した頃、浜辺の洞窟では、サリエルがブルースを匿い怪我の様子を見ていた。そこにルシオが現れる。ルシオから、サリエルの探す次元の狭間は簡単に見つからないと告げられるも、諦める様子のないサリエル。そんな中、突如サメ達が洞窟に現れる。サメ達に共闘に誘われたブルースだったが、ブルースは突然変異してサメ達を薙ぎ払うのだった。
Korean: [지타] 일행과 하루트 일행이 합류했을 무렵, 해변의 동굴에서는 사리엘이 브루스를 숨겨 상처를 치료해주고 있었다. 거기에 루시오가 나타난다. 루시오로부터 사리엘이 찾는 차원의 틈새는 간단하게 찾을 수 없다고 들어도, 포기하지 않는 모습을 보이는 사리엘. 그러던 중, 갑자기 상어 들이 동굴에 나타난다. 상어들은 브루스에게 함께 싸우자고 요청했지만, 브루스는 갑자기 상어들을 베어 넘기는 것이었다.

Origin:
一行が合流を果たす頃、
浜辺の洞窟にはサリエルが佇んでいた。
Korean: 일행이 합류했을 즈음, 사리엘은 해변의 동굴에 서 있었다.

Origin:
その側には彼に身を寄せるように、
水際で横たわる海洋生物の姿もあった。
Korean: 그 곁에는 그에게 몸을 맡기듯이 물가에 드러누운 해양생물의 모습도 보였다.

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrk……
Korean: Sharrrk……

Name: サリエル
Origin:
良かった……
ブドウもおはぎも完食だ。
Korean: 잘 됐어... 포도도 팥떡도 다 먹었구나.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
まだ怪我は痛む？
傷口の具合を見てもいい？
Korean: 아직 다친 데 아파? 상처 어떤지 봐도 돼?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
うん。
昨日よりも再生できている。
直にきちんと完治する筈だ。
Korean: 응. 어제보다 많이 재생됐어. 곧 완전히 나을 거야.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
でも……
その時はまた人間を捕食する？
Korean: 그런데... 그렇게 되면 또 인간을 포식할 거야?

Name: ブルース
Origin: Shark……！
Korean: Shark……！

Name: サリエル
Origin:
空の民は日々進化する……
あの樽爆弾もきっと進化する。
Korean: 하늘의 민족은 나날이 진화해... 그 통 폭탄도 더 진화할 거야.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
マーティンの覚悟だって本物だ。
次は普通の怪我では済まないだろう。
Korean: 마틴의 각오도 진짜야. 다음에는 평범한 상처로 끝나지 않겠지.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
ずっと君を匿えるといいんだけど、
僕はいつまでもここにいる訳には──
Korean: 계속 널 숨겨줄 수 있으면 좋을 텐데, 나도 언제까지나 여기 있을 수는...

Name: ルシオ
Origin: 虹を探す旅に出るため？
Korean: 무지개를 찾는 여행을 떠나기 위해서인가요?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
すみません。
貴方の行動が少々気になったもので。
Korean: 죄송합니다. 당신의 행동이 조금 신경쓰여서요.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
だがブルースを匿っていたとは。
空に敵対する者同士の情ですか？
Korean: 브루스를 숨겨주고 있었을 줄이야... 하늘과 적대하는 자들끼리의 정인가요?

Name: サリエル
Origin: ……君は誰？
Korean: ...넌 누구야?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
私はルシオ。
かつては劇団の役者だったのですが──
Korean: 저는 루시오. 예전에는 극단의 배우였습니다만...

Name: サリエル
Origin: ……名前は知っている。
Korean: ...이름은 알고 있어.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
でも違う。
君は何か違う。
Korean: 하지만 달라. 너는 뭔가 달라.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
なるほど……
貴方の受容体は複雑に出来ていますね。
Korean: 그렇군요... 당신의 수용체는 복잡하게 구성되어 있군요.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
ルシフェルと似ている事も気にせず、
真っ先に本質を捉えようとするとは。
Korean: 루시펠과 닮아 있음에도 신경쓰지 않고 보자마자 본질을 파악하려고 할 줄이야.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
私は虹を知る者ですよ。
故に貴方の目的が気になったのです。
Korean: 저는 무지개에 대해 아는 자입니다. 그렇기에 당신의 목적이 신경쓰였죠.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
君は……！
虹の場所を知っている？
Korean: 넌...! 무지개가 어디 있는지 알아?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
場所ですか。
創世神話を基に私の知る限り……
Korean: 장소 말인가요? 창세신화를 기반으로 제가 아는 한에서는...

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
この世界を絵画とすると、
あの虹色の時空はカンヴァスそのもの。
Korean: 이 세계를 그림이라고 한다면, 그 무지개빛 시공은 캔버스 그 자체.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
つまり場所という概念で言えば、
どこにでも在ると答える他ありません。
Korean: 즉 장소라는 개념으로 한다면 어디에나 있다고 말할 수밖에 없겠군요.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
あの時は虹が架かった。
でも今は架かってない。
次に架かるのはいつかわかる？
Korean: 그 때는 무지개가 걸려 있었어. 하지만 지금은 없어. 다음에 걸리는 건 언제인지 알아?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
あの時は次元が極大に歪んでいた……
何度も発現する類のものではないかと。
Korean: 그 때는 차원이 극도로 일그러져 있었죠... 몇 번이나 발견할 수 있는 종류는 아니라고 생각합니다만.

Name: サリエル
Origin: そう……
Korean: 그래...

Name: サリエル
Origin:
次元についてはわからないけど、
虹が架かる可能性はあるんだね。
Korean: 차원에 대해서는 모르겠지만, 무지개가 다시 걸릴 가능성은 있다는 거지.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
考えてみる。
その方法を。
Korean: 생각해 볼래. 그 방법을.

Name: ルシオ
Origin: 考える……？
Korean: 생각해요...?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
前提条件の難度は肌身でわかる筈……
まだ諦めずに探すつもりなのですか？
Korean: 전제조건의 어려움은 피부로 느끼고 있을 겁니다... 그래도 포기하지 않고 찾을 생각인가요?

Name: サリエル
Origin:
うん。
僕は知りたい事があるんだ。
Korean: 응. 난 알고 싶은 게 있어.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
疑問を与えて、
己の頭で考えさせ、
その先にあるのは……
Korean: ...... 의문을 부여하고, 자신의 머리로 생각하게 하고, 그리고 그 끝에는...

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
貴方の上官の思惑は、
すでに達成の途上にあるようですね。
Korean: 당신의 상관이 의도한 것은 이미 달성되어가고 있는 모양이군요.

Name: ブルース
Origin: …………！？
Korean: …………！？

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: サリエル
Origin:
サメ……？
飛行形態……？
Korean: 상어...? 비행형태...?

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
突然変異ですね。
貴方はサンちゃん達と合流を。
Korean: 돌연변이군요. 당신은 산쨩 일행과 합류하십시오.

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
この数に加えてブルースの戦力、
羽を失った身では少々厄介かと。
Korean: 이 수에 더해서 브루스의 전력이라면 날개를 잃은 몸으로는 꽤 골치아플 겁니다.

Name: サリエル
Origin:
戦力……
ブルースがまた敵に……？
Korean: 전력... 브루스는 다시 적이 되는 거야?

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark？
Korean: Shark？

Name: ブルース
Origin: Shark……
Korean: Shark……

Name: サメ
Origin:
Shark！
Shark Shark Shark！
Korean:
Shark！
Shark Shark Shark！

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrk──！
Korean: Sharrrrrk──！

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark──！？
Korean: Shark──！？

Name: サリエル
Origin: ブルース……！
Korean: 브루스...!

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
彼も突然変異を……
だが同種を薙ぎ払った……？
Korean: 그도 돌연변이가 됐군요... 하지만 같은 종을 쓰러뜨리다니...?

Name: ブルース
Origin: Sharrrrrrk──
Korean: Sharrrrrrk──

Origin: 浜辺の避難誘導が終了したのを確認し、サメ達を殲滅すべく力を解放しようとするサンダルフォン。しかし商工会の代表のひとりがサメを駆除しようと現れ、サメ達の標的になる。サンダルフォンは人間の無謀さに呆れて毒づきながらも庇い、サメ達に応戦するのだった。
Korean: 해변의 피난유도가 끝난 것을 확인하고, 상어를 섬멸하기 위해 힘을 해방하려고 하는 산달폰. 하지만 상공회의 대표중 한명이 상어를 퇴치하고자 나타나, 상어의 표적이 된다. 산달폰은 인간의 무모함에 기가 막혀 하면서도 감싸, 상어들을 맞상대 하는 것이었다.

Origin:
ブルースの咆哮が響き渡る頃、
サンダルフォンは奮闘を続けており……
Korean: 브루스의 포효가 울려퍼지던 때, 산달폰은 분투를 계속하고 있었다.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: はあぁ！
Korean: 하앗!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: 失せろ！
Korean: 사라져라!

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark……！
Korean: Shark……！

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
フン……
浜辺の避難誘導は終わったようだな。
Korean: 흥... 근처의 피난유도는 끝난 모양이군.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
では本気を出させて貰おう。
何匹いようと一気に終わらせてやる。
Korean: 그럼 제대로 보여주도록 하지. 몇 마리든 한 방에 끝내 주마.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: 天司の力を舐めるなよ──
Korean: 천사의 힘을 얕보지 마라...!

Name: 繁華街の商人
Origin:
クソッタレ！
この害獣共め！
Korean: 젠장할! 이 괴물 녀석!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
人間だと？
なぜわざわざ前線に来て……
Korean: 인간? 왜 일부러 전선까지 나와서...

Name: 繁華街の商人
Origin:
避難など必要あるか！
さっさと駆除せねば経済が回らん！
Korean: 피난할 필요는 없어! 빨리 처리하지 않으면 경제가 끝장이라고!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
馬鹿！
奴等の餌食になりたいのか！？
Korean: 멍청이! 놈들의 먹이가 될 생각인가?

Name: 繁華街の商人
Origin: ウルサァァァイ！
Korean: 시끄러워어어!

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark！ Shark！ Shark！
Korean: Shark！ Shark！ Shark！

Name: 繁華街の商人
Origin: ヒィッ……！？

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
チィッ！
馬鹿すぎて始末に負えん……！
Korean: 칫! 너무 멍청한 짓이라 대처하기가 힘들군...!

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: だが……
Korean: 하지만...

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: クソォォォ！
Korean: 젠장!!

Name: サメ
Origin: Sharrrk！
Korean: Sharrrk！

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
邪魔だ……
さっさとどこかに隠れていろ！
Korean: 방해된다! 빨리 어디든 가서 숨어 있어!

Name: 繁華街の商人
Origin: あ、あぁ……！

Name: サメ
Origin: Shark！ Shark！ Shark！
Korean: Shark！ Shark！ Shark！

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin:
来い……
俺を狙え。
俺の血を嗅いで集まって来い。
Korean: 와라... 날 노려. 내 피 냄새를 맡고 모여들어라.

Name: サンダルフォン
Origin: この空は俺達が守る──
Korean: 이 하늘은 우리가 지킨다!

Origin: A steady stream of winged sharks attacks the beach. The district chief appears and orders beachgoers to evacuate to city hall. At Sandalphon's suggestion, [Djeeta] and the others guide the tourists to safety while the supreme primarch remains on the beach to fend off sharks.

Name: Shark
Origin: Sha-shasharrrk!

Name: Shop Staff
Origin: Whooa! They're flying in from here, there, and everywhere!

Name: Waiter
Origin: Aaaah! Gimme back my mankini!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Haaah!

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark...

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Oraoraoraaa!

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Curse it... What in the world's going on with these things?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: As if I know! I've never seen a winged species before... There's no way this many could be living in these parts.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: What do you mean to say? That they've grown wings in the past couple of days?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I don't have a clue! Anyway, you kids go cover the east end of the beach!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hold on! There are so many tourists around... If we spread ourselves too thin, you won't be able to go all-out, Sandalphon!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Before anything else, we have to prevent a panic.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Mm... Hm...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What is it? Did you blow a fuse?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: It's just that... You all seem so calm. This isn't exactly a normal state of affairs for skyfarers, is it?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ahaha... You're right that it's kind of strange, but...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Our summers are pretty eventful. We've seen all sorts of funny sea creatures before this, like eals and urkins.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Hm? Different types of sea life?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: All kinds! There was a giant watermelon too.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Old Bruce spooked us at first, but this is just an average summer for us.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Hahaha... Don't tell me that you were all involved in that as well.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: The world has gone mad...

Name: District Chief
Origin: Beachgoers! Please evacuate to city hall immediately! There's no safer place on the island!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ah, District Chief!

Name: District Chief
Origin: Everyone! I'm so glad to see you're safe!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: You're opening up city hall then? Good thinking, but is there enough time to lead everyone there?

Name: District Chief
Origin: Frankly speaking, no... Staff members are relaying the evacuation order, but... there's only so much we can do in these conditions.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: I see... Those sharks might be small, but they're dangerous creatures. Make sure each staff member has an agent accompanying them.

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: [Djeeta], could you help relay the evacuation notice to the people on the beach?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: We got it! All we need to do is show 'em the way to city hall, right?

Name: District Chief
Origin: Thanks! You saved us during the cataclysms, so I know you've got this!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: [Djeeta], you lead the mortals. I'll bring up the rear.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Bring up the rear? Sandalphon, you don't mean to say that...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: This isn't some sort of self-flagellation. My mobility simply makes me best suited for the task.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I guess that's true... Give us some sort of signal if something happens. I'll fly right there!

Name: Lyria
Origin: I'll fly there too!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Heh... Understood. Let's move out!

Name: District Chief
Origin: You don't know what a help you are. But please don't neglect your own safety.

Name: District Chief
Origin: Hm? You look familiar. Do I know you from somewhere?

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: This will be a war zone momentarily. Follow [Djeeta] and the others.

Name: District Chief
Origin: All right.

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Haaah!

Back in town, Halluel and Malluel attempt to help the oceanographer evacuate to city hall. They realize, though, that their wings are sunburnt and unusable for the time being, and they take refuge in a nearby underground bar. It dawns on the oceanographer that the sharks' wings could be mutations caused by the meteor impact off the shore—and in the following moment, sharks burst out from the bar's floor. The shark hunter rushes in and saves the oceanographer at the last moment.
The blue-gray creatures rain down on the backstreets, wriggling just off the ground in search of prey.
Terrified citizens frantically attempt to flee.

Name: Lucio Fan
Origin: This street's done for... They're all over!

Name: Senior Lucio Fan
Origin: That way's blocked too. It's like they can tell where we're headed...

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Halluel
Origin: Take this!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Things are totally out of hand... The sharks are acting like the town is theirs.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: This shouldn't be possible... Marine animals' anatomy doesn't allow for wings...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: But maybe the hypothesis I read in that one research paper could explain this...

Name: Halluel
Origin: Everyone! I'll fly around to create a diversion.

Name: Halluel
Origin: While I'm busy, Mal, get Ellen and the others to city hall.

Name: Malluel
Origin: All right! Watch out for yourself, Hal!

Name: Halluel
Origin: Yeah. How embarrassing would it be if an archangel of instruction were clumsier than—

Name: Halluel
Origin: Ouch!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Hal! What's going on? Does your back hurt?

Name: Halluel
Origin: I don't believe this...

Name: Halluel
Origin: My back's so sunburned I can't spread my wings...

Name: Malluel
Origin: No way! Me either—

Name: Malluel
Origin: Oww!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Mal!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Don't push yourselves too hard! Just get indoors as soon as you can...

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: This way! My bar's in the basement... We can take shelter there!

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: It's you... Okay!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Phew... It does seem safe down here.

Name: Azrael
Origin: Lemme see your backs, and I'll rub some salve on them.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Thanks. How could our wings end up so useless...

Name: Halluel
Origin: Is this a design flaw that went unnoticed for two thousand whole years?

Name: Malluel
Origin: I guess the Astrals didn't consider vacation as one of our use cases. Or maybe this only happens to lesser archangels...

Name: Malluel
Origin: I'd kinda like to lodge a complaint with the lab, but I guess our lives now are pretty far beyond our original specifications. There'll probably be more irregularities in the future.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Irregularities... Their wings must be like those described in that paper too...

Name: Azrael
Origin: Ellen?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Ah, sorry. I was just thinking about the sharks' wings.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: There's a good chance that a mutation created them. Mutations typically occur through genetic processes...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: But what in the world could be behind these? There might have been some anomaly off the coast...

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: Anomaly? Now that you mention it, there was an earthquake off the coast this morning. Some of the fishermen mentioned a big flash and an explosion...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: A flash, an earthquake, and an explosion...

Name: Oceanographer
Origin:
...!
It was a meteor strike, wasn't it!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Meteor strike?

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: Well holy heaven! Some strange stone fell from the far side of the sky and transformed them all at once.

Name: Lucio Fan
Origin: This feels like a nightmare... Who ever thought this would happen to us...

Name: Senior Lucio Fan
Origin: It's real life though... I don't see any other explanation.

Name: Azrael
Origin: Is that right?

Name: Halluel
Origin: Well, no matter what's causing this... We can use this bar as a base to continue our evacuation efforts.

Name: Halluel
Origin: Fortunately we've got a lot of food... Well, assuming you don't mind, barkeeper.

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: I wouldn't have a business without my customers. Seeing how useless I was in the chamber of commerce sessions, this is the perfect chance to help out.

Name: Malluel
Origin: Teehee. You're so cool, Mr. Barkeeper.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Thank you. If there's any way we can help...

Name: Lucio Fan
Origin: What... Is that another earthquake?

Name: Senior Lucio Fan
Origin: Hold on. The floorboards are rattling. Something's coming from below!

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark!

Name: Malluel
Origin: Oh no! That shark popped out of the ground like some kind of mole!

Name: Halluel
Origin: Could it really have swum here by digging through the ground?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Unbelievable... What a mind-boggling mutation!

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Watch out, Ellen!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ellen! Are you hurt?

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Mm... Am I still alive?

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Yeah, you are. Don't think I'd let you die before me.

Name: Oceanographer
Origin: Martin!

Name: Shark Hunter
Origin: Ellen!

Name: Azrael
Origin: Kissy, kissy.

Name: Barkeeper
Origin: Heh... You two can't keep your hands off each other, huh?

Around the time that [Djeeta], Halluel, and the others reassemble, Sariel is hiding Old Bruce in a cave and tending to his wounds. Lucio appears and tells Sariel that finding a dimensional rift will be no simple matter, but that doesn't deter Sariel. Sharks then appear in the cave, after which Old Bruce mutates and mows them down.
Around the time when other party members reunite, Sariel is sitting in a beachside cave.
A marine creature is lying at the water's edge as if to be near him.

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrk...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Oh, good... You ate all the grapes and bean cakes.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Do your burns still hurt? Mind if I see how you're healing?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Okay. They're better than yesterday. You're going to be all healed in no time.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Do you plan to eat people again then?

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark!

Name: Sariel
Origin: Skydwellers keep on evolving... And their barrel bombs are going to keep evolving too.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Martin's not playing around. Next time your wounds might not be this light.

Name: Sariel
Origin: It would be nice to keep on hiding you... But I can't stay here forever.

Name: Lucio
Origin: On a journey to find the rainbow?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Pardon me. I couldn't help but wonder about your actions.

Name: Lucio
Origin: It certainly didn't occur to me that you'd be hiding Old Bruce. Are you two bonding as fellow enemies of the sky?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Who are you...

Name: Lucio
Origin: I'm Lucio. Once I was an actor in a theater troupe.

Name: Sariel
Origin: I know your name...

Name: Sariel
Origin: But something's wrong. There's something wrong with you.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I see... Your receptors are quite intricately constructed.

Name: Lucio
Origin: How surprising that you'd attempt to grasp my nature without remarking on my resemblance to Lucifer.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I am the one who knows of the rainbow. I am therefore concerned with your goal.

Name: Sariel
Origin: You... Do you know where the rainbow is?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Where it is? Based on my knowledge of the creation myth...

Name: Lucio
Origin: If one were to compare this world to a painting, the spatiotemporal phenomenon you all briefly perceived as that rainbow would be the canvas itself.

Name: Lucio
Origin: An explanation using notions of place would demand the answer that it is everywhere.

Name: Sariel
Origin: I saw the rainbow back then. But now I don't. When will it show up next?

Name: Lucio
Origin: It doesn't appear simply as a matter of course. This dimension was warped beyond belief when you set eyes upon it...

Name: Sariel
Origin: Oh...

Name: Sariel
Origin: I don't know about different dimensions... But there's a chance I could see that rainbow again.

Name: Sariel
Origin: I'll think more. About how.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Think?

Name: Lucio
Origin: You surely have an instinctual sense of the difficulty by now... And yet you would persist?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Yes. There's something I want to know.

Name: Lucio
Origin: You're given doubts, made to ponder them with your own mind, and as a result...

Name: Lucio
Origin: Your master's expectations are well on their way to being met.

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sariel
Origin: Sharks? Flying sharks?

Name: Lucio
Origin: It would appear they're the product of a mutation. Go rejoin Sandy and the others.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Given the sharks' numbers and Old Bruce's might, this battle may prove too dangerous for someone who's lost his wings.

Name: Sariel
Origin: Is Old Bruce our enemy again?

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark?

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Shark...

Name: Shark
Origin:
Shark!
Shark! Shark! Shark!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrrrk!

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark?

Name: Sariel
Origin: Old Bruce!

Name: Lucio
Origin: He's mutated as well! And he's laying waste to others of his kind!

Name: Old Bruce
Origin: Sharrrrrrk!

Seeing that the evacuation of the beach is complete, Sandalphon is about to unleash the entirety of his power. Just then a restaurateur from town shows up to destroy the sharks, which quickly turn on him. Sandalphon snips at the businessman for his carelessness, then counters the sharks' attacks.
As Old Bruce's cries resound, Sandalphon contends with still more sharks.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Haah!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Away with you!

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Hmph... The evacuation of the beach seems to be complete.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: So let me show you the full extent of my power. Your teeming frenzy will be obliterated in an instant.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Don't underestimate an archangel's power!

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Damn you, you worthless sea scum!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: What are you thinking, mortal? Rushing out onto the front lines...

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: No way will I evacuate! If we don't wipe these things out, the economy crashes!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: You idiot! Do you want to be fish food?

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Shuuut uuuup!

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark! Shark! Shark!

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: Eeek!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Tch! I can't deal with this level of idiocy!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: But...

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Damn!

Name: Shark
Origin: Sharrrk!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: You're in the way... Go find cover at once!

Name: Restauranteur
Origin: A... All right...

Name: Shark
Origin: Shark! Shark! Shark!

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: Come... Come for me. Let the scent of my blood entice you.

Name: Sandalphon
Origin: We will protect these skies.
